This file is a merged representation of the entire codebase, combined into a single document by Repomix.

================================================================
File Summary
================================================================

Purpose:
--------
This file contains a packed representation of the entire repository's contents.
It is designed to be easily consumable by AI systems for analysis, code review,
or other automated processes.

File Format:
------------
The content is organized as follows:
1. This summary section
2. Repository information
3. Directory structure
4. Multiple file entries, each consisting of:
  a. A separator line (================)
  b. The file path (File: path/to/file)
  c. Another separator line
  d. The full contents of the file
  e. A blank line

Usage Guidelines:
-----------------
- This file should be treated as read-only. Any changes should be made to the
  original repository files, not this packed version.
- When processing this file, use the file path to distinguish
  between different files in the repository.
- Be aware that this file may contain sensitive information. Handle it with
  the same level of security as you would the original repository.

Notes:
------
- Some files may have been excluded based on .gitignore rules and Repomix's configuration
- Binary files are not included in this packed representation. Please refer to the Repository Structure section for a complete list of file paths, including binary files
- Files matching patterns in .gitignore are excluded
- Files matching default ignore patterns are excluded

Additional Info:
----------------

================================================================
Directory Structure
================================================================

File: activation_code.html
================
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <meta http-equiv="refresh" content="1; url=en_US/activation_code.html" />
    <title>File Centipede Activation Code</title>
    <script>
        (function(){
            var list = ["en_US","zh_CN","zh_TW","ru_RU","ko_KR"];
            var lang = navigator.language.replace('-','_');
            var name = "en_US";

            for(let i=0;i<list.length;++i) {
                if(list[i] === lang){
                    name = list[i];
                    break;
                }
            }
            window.location = name + "/activation_code.html";
        })();
    </script>
</head>
<body>

<h1>File Centipede</h1>
<div>
    <a href="en_US/activation_code.html"><h2>English</h2></a>
    <a href="zh_CN/activation_code.html"><h2>简体中文</h2></a>
    <a href="zh_TW/activation_code.html"><h2>繁體中文</h2></a>
    <a href="ru_RU/activation_code.html"><h2>Русский</h2></a>
    <a href="ko_KR/activation_code.html"><h2>한국어</h2></a>
</div>

</body>
</html>

================
File: certbot.sh
================
certbot certonly -d "filecxx.com" -d "*.filecxx.com" --agree-tos --manual --preferred-challenges dns --server https://acme-v02.api.letsencrypt.org/directory

File: commit.sh
================
git add --all
git commit -m "commit"
git push origin main
git push origin2

    <link rel="icon" href="../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../style/base.css?t=1658505138017">
    <style>
        li{
            font-size: 16px;
            padding: 4px 8px 4px 8px;
        }
        .code_time{
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: bold;
            padding: 12px 0 12px 0;
        }
        .code_text{
            padding: 12px 0 12px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #bcbebf;
            word-wrap: break-word;
            word-break: normal;
        }
    </style>
</head>

            <h4>Die Premium-Edition wird zu einer kostenlosen Edition, wenn die GitHub-Repository-Stars 100K erreicht haben.</h4>
            <div>
                <span style="font-weight: bold">Github:</span>
                <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede">https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede</a>
            </div>
            <div class="tips_">
                <p>
                    Wenn Sie ein Mitwirkender dieses Projekts sind, können Sie einen lebenslangen Aktivierungscode für sich selbst erhalten.
                </p>
                <p>
                    Wenn Sie nicht zu diesem Projekt beitragen können, können Sie einen langfristigen & lebenslangen Aktivierungscode vom Dashboard aus tauschen.
                </p>
                <p>
                    <b>Dashboard: </b>
                    <a href="https://w.filecxx.com" target="_blank">https://w.filecxx.com</a>

<script>
    (function(){
        var list      = document.getElementById("codes").innerText.split('\n');
        var code_list = document.getElementById("code_list");
        var number    = 0;

        for(var i=0;i<list.length;++i)
        {
            var text = list[i].trim();

            if(text.length === 0){
                continue;
            }
            var item = document.createElement("div");

            if(number++ % 2 === 0){
                item.className = "code_time";
            }else{
                item.className = "code_text";
            }
            item.innerText = text;
            code_list.appendChild(item);
        }
    })();
</script>
<script src="../script/base.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};
        t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script>

File: de_DE/documentation/browser_integration.html

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">

    <title>Browser-Erweiterung - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../style/base.css">
    <script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};
        t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script> 

</head>
<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">Startseite</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">Funktionen</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">Herunterladen</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">Screenshot</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">Benutzerbewertungen</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">Dokumentation</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">Deutsch</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>


    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Wie installiert man Browser-Erweiterung</h1>
            <br/>Diese Webbrowser-Erweiterung kann verwendet werden, um das Standard-Download-Tool des Browsers zu ersetzen. <br/><br/>Die Erweiterung kann Videos und Audio von der Webseite erfassen, sie unterstützt m3u8 HTTP-Stream-Video-Download und Auto-Merge, sie unterstützt das automatische Entschlüsseln der meisten verschlüsselten Videos, und sie unterstützt das Abrufen aller Magnet-Links von der Webseite.<br/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_video_bar.png'/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_videos.png'/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_audios.png'/>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Wie installiert man Firefox Browser-Erweiterung</h2>
            <div>
                <h4>Öffnen:</h4> about:addons
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons.png'/>

                <br/><br/>reinziehen (hier fallen lassen) firefox.xpi Datei on
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons_drop.png'/>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons_add.png'/>
            </div>

        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Wie installiert man Chrome Browser-Erweiterung</h2>
            <div>
                <h4>Öffnen:</h4> chrome://extensions/

                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_menu.png'/>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_menu2.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Aktivieren Entwicklermodus
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_extension_dev_mode.png'/>

                <br/><br/>reinziehen (hier fallen lassen) chrome.crx Datei on
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_drop.png'/>

                <h3>oder:</h3>
                Entpacken chrome.zip
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_unzip.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Ungepackt laden <b></b>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_load_unpacked.png'/>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Teilen</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Adresse erstellen</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h2>Javascript</h2>
            <p>Wenn Sie eine Website betreiben.</p>
            <p>Fügen Sie dieses Skript in Ihre Webseite ein, oder setzen Sie den Skriptcode in Ihre Webseite, aber der bessere Weg ist, das Skript auf Ihrer Webseite zu platzieren, falls diese Webseite nicht online ist.</p>
            <div>
                <pre><xmp><script1 src="//filecxx.com/script/create_filec_address.js"></script1></xmp></pre>
            </div>
            <div>
                <a href="../../script/create_filec_address.js">Skript herunterladen</a>
            </div>

            <div>
                <h3>Verwendung:</h3>
                <p>
                    Geben Sie ein JSON in die Funktion create_filec_address ein, json-Felder siehe
                    <a href="#json_fields">JSON</a>
                </p>
                <pre><code>create_filec_address({uri:"http://...."});</code></pre>
            </div>

            <div>
                <h4>Sample:</h4>
                <a href="fileu:0eyJ1cmkiOiJodHRwczovL2dpdGh1Yi5jb20vZmlsZWN4eC9GaWxlQ2VudGlwZWRlL3Jhdy9tYWluL3JlbGVhc2UvY2hyb21lLmNyeCJ9">
                    fileu:0eyJ1cmkiOiJodHRwczovL2dpdGh1Yi5jb20vZmlsZWN4eC9GaWxlQ2VudGlwZWRlL3Jhdy9tYWluL3JlbGVhc2UvY2hyb21lLmNyeCJ9
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div style="margin-top: 24px">
                <p>
                    Wenn Sie Ihre echte Adresse vor Benutzern verbergen oder einige Einschränkungen für den Benutzerdownload geben möchten, sollten Sie das \"Adresse erstellen\"-Tool aus der Software verwenden, es kann eine verschlüsselte Adresse generieren.
                </p>
                <p>
                    (Javascript kann keine verschlüsselte Adresse erstellen.)
                </p>
            </div>
            <div>
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_create_address.png" alt="Adresse erstellen">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section json_keys" id="json_fields">
            <h2>JSON: Aufgabe hinzufügen</h2>
            <div>
                Sie können JSON als Adresse verwenden, um eine Aufgabe hinzuzufügen, aber denken Sie daran, dass der JSON-String in einer Zeile sein muss.
                <br/>
                <br/>
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_add_json_task.png" alt="">
            </div>

            <table class="grid" style="margin-top: 12px">
                <thead>
                <tr>
                    <td>Schlüssel</td>
                    <td>Typ</td>
                    <td style="width: 140px">Beschreibung</td>
                </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                <tr>
                    <td>uri</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Adresse</td>
                </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>

            <h4>HTTP / HTTPS / Stream Optional</h4>
            <table class="grid" style="margin-top: 12px">
                <thead>
                <tr>
                    <td>Schlüssel</td>
                    <td>Typ</td>
                    <td style="width: 140px">Beschreibung</td>
                </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                <tr>
                    <td>method</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>GET, POST ... You know the thing</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>catalog</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Katalog</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>page_url</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Seiten-URL</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>user_agent</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>User Agent</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>cookies</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Cookies</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>headers</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>HTTP Headers</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>content_type</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Content Type (for HTTP POST)</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>data</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>HTTP request data</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>connect_timeout</td>
                    <td>Nummer</td>
                    <td>Verbindungs-Timeout</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>max_connections</td>
                    <td>Nummer</td>
                    <td>Maximale Verbindungen</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>max_redirect</td>
                    <td>Nummer</td>
                    <td>Maximale Weiterleitung</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>max_retry</td>
                    <td>Nummer</td>
                    <td>Maximale Wiederholungen</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>file_name</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Dateiname</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>speed_limit_download</td>
                    <td>Nummer</td>
                    <td>Download-Geschwindigkeitslimit</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>auto_rename_file</td>
                    <td>bool</td>
                    <td>Datei automatisch umbenennen</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>ignore_remote_modified</td>
                    <td>Nummer</td>
                    <td>Remote-Änderungen ignorieren</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>ignore_server_busy</td>
                    <td>Nummer</td>
                    <td>Serverauslastung ignorieren</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>ignore_http_error</td>
                    <td>Nummer</td>
                    <td>HTTP-Fehler ignorieren</td>
                </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>

            <h4>FTP / FTPS Optional</h4>
            <table class="grid" style="margin-top: 12px">

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Wie konvertiert man Magnet-Link in Torrent-Datei</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>1. 
Click the magnet to torrent item from the software menu -> tools -> magnet to torrent.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_tool_magnet2torrent.png"></p>
                <p><img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_magnet2torrent.png"></p>
            </div>

        </div>

    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>

File: de_DE/documentation/how_to_create_a_torrent.html

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>Wie erstellt man einen Torrent - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../style/base.css">

        <div class="section">
            <h1>Wie lädt man Dateien herunter</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>1. Click the add button from the software.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/how_to_download_1.png"></p>

                <p>2. Enter or paste the file URI address to the EditBox.</p>
                <p>3. Click the download now button.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_add_task.png"></p>

                <p>4. Or, use the browser extension to download files through the web browser..</p>

                <p>
                    <a href="browser_integration.html">Wie installiert man Browser-Erweiterung</a>
                </p>

    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">Deutsch</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Wie erhält man die Datei-Checksumme</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>
                    
File Centipede provided a file checksum tool located on the software menu -> tools -> Checksum
                </p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_tool_checksum.png" alt="File Centipede Checksum">
                </p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_checksum_tool.png" alt="Checksummen-Tool">
                </p>

            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Befehlszeile</h3>
                <div>
                    <p>fileu --checksum Path</p>
                    <p>filec md5 Path</p>
                    <p>filec crc32 Path</p>
                    <p>filec sha1 Path</p>
                    <p>filec sha256 Path</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Teilen</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>Wie erhöht man die Download-Geschwindigkeit - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../style/base.css">
    <script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};
        t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script> 

</head>
<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">Startseite</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">Funktionen</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">Herunterladen</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">Screenshot</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">Benutzerbewertungen</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">Dokumentation</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">Deutsch</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Wie erhöht man die Download-Geschwindigkeit</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
For the HTTP task, the default parallel setting is smooth, but you can change it to fastest, it could increase your download speed and save your time about 1-30 seconds.</p>
                <p>
But changing it to the fastest may cause your IP address to be blocked by the remote server. (low probability)</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_settings_http.png" alt="File Centipede HTTP setting"></p>
                <p>
For the Torrent task, you can add trackers to increase your download & upload speed.
But the condition is other peers are using the same tracker and downloading or uploading the same file.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_software_task_add_tracker.png" width="800" alt="File Centipede Torrent tracker"></p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Teilen</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

<script src="../../script/base.js"></script>

</body>
</html>

<html lang="en">
<head>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Wie installiert man File Centipede</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>1. unzip the downloaded zip file.</p>
                <p>2. click fileu from the directory.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/fileu_exe.png"></p>
                <p>3. click the install button.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_install.png" alt="Wie installiert man File Centipede"></p>
                <p>4. install done.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Befehlszeile</h3>
                <p>
                    filec -i system_service
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Teilen</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>

            </div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Wie deinstalliert man File Centipede</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>1. Click help from the software menu.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help.png"></p>
                <p>2. Click the Uninstall item.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_uninstall.png"></p>
                <p>3. Click the Uninstall button.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_uninstall_btn.png"></p>
                <p>4. Delete the software directory.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Befehlszeile</h3>
                <p>
                    filec -u
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Teilen</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>

                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>BitTorrent-Client</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede is also a Bittorrent Client. It has all Bittorrent Client Features like Torrent and Magnet link downloading, Seeding,
Create Torrent, Trackers, Web seeds, Peers list, speed limit, and the torrent/magnet conversion.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_software.png" width="800" alt="file centipede bittorrent client">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Herunterladen</a>
        </div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>FTP-Dateimanager</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede is also an FTP file manager, it can download & upload files from an FTP server, including directories or the whole FTP site.</p>
                <p>
It's very easy to use, you don't need to input tons of settings, you just need to enter the host address into the address bar.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_ftp.png" width="800" alt="FTP file manager">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
To maximize the speed of listing directory files,
File Centipede can cache all directory files you have visited, the next time you list the same directory will be like opening a local directory.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">Deutsch</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Fern-Download-Manager</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>File centipede provided a native user interface for remote file downloading.</p>
                <p>It's located on the main menu called <b>remote</b>.</p>
                <p>It's very simple to use. You just need to input the remote host's IP/domain address, then click the host from the menu item you just added.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_remote_add.png" alt="add remote host">
                </p>
                <p>If you want your computer to be connectable, your need to open the Setting -> Service, and toggle the <b>Remote access</b> to the <b>enable</b>. and don't forget to set a password.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_settings_enable_remote_access.png" alt="enable remote access">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Befehlszeile</h3>
                <p>filec remote_access on</p>
                <p>filec service_port 10111</p>
                <p>filec service_password your_password</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Herunterladen</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Teilen</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>

                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>

                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Video-Downloader</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede can download videos from more than 99% of websites.</p>
                <p>
It even can analyze video addresses from Javascript, and extract decrypted video-key from Javascript closure.
For some special websites, only File Centipede is able to download its video.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
It provided two easy ways to download videos or audio from the webpage.
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
1: Download from the floating bar beside of video.</p>
            </div>

            <div>
                <img src="../../images/extension_video_bar.png" alt="download web video">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <p class="article_">
2: Download from the popup window.</p>
            <div>
                <img src="../../images/extension_videos.png" alt="download web videos from popup">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../documentation/browser_integration.html" class="article_">Wie installiert man Browser-Erweiterung</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Herunterladen</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Teilen</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>

    <meta name="description" content="File Centipede ist ein All-In-One Internet-Datei-Upload/Download-Manager, BitTorrent-Client, WebDAV-Client, FTP-Client und SSH-Client. Es ist darauf ausgelegt, schnell, anpassbar und benutzerfreundlich zu sein. Es unterstützt Multi-Protokolle und enthält viele nützliche Hilfswerkzeuge wie HTTP-Anforderer, Datei-Merge und Encoder. Mit der Browser-Integration können Sie Audio und Videos von Websites herunterladen, sogar verschlüsselte Videos."/>
    <meta name="keywords" content="File Centipede, Internet Download Manager, Torrent-Client, Torrents Download Manager, Videos von Web herunterladen, Schnellster Download-Beschleuniger, Bester Download-Manager, Linux Download-Manager, Kostenloser Download-Manager, WebDAV-Client, FTP-Client, SSH-Client"/>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section description" id="description">
            <h2>Beschreibung</h2>
            <div id="description_text">File Centipede ist ein All-In-One Internet-Datei-Upload/Download-Manager, BitTorrent-Client, WebDAV-Client, FTP-Client und SSH-Client. Es ist darauf ausgelegt, schnell, anpassbar und benutzerfreundlich zu sein. Es unterstützt Multi-Protokolle und enthält viele nützliche Hilfswerkzeuge wie HTTP-Anforderer, Datei-Merge und Encoder. Mit der Browser-Integration können Sie Audio und Videos von Websites herunterladen, sogar verschlüsselte Videos.</div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a class="label_ blue_" href="os/linux_download_manager.html">Linux Download-Manager</a>
            <a class="label_ blue_" href="features/video_downloader.html">Video-Downloader</a>
            <a class="label_ blue_" href="features/bittorrent_client.html">BitTorrent-Client</a>
            <a class="label_ blue_" href="features/webdav_file_manager.html">WebDAV-Dateimanager</a>
            <a class="label_ blue_" href="features/ftp_file_manager.html">FTP-Dateimanager</a>
            <a class="label_ blue_" href="features/ssh_file_manager.html">SSH-Dateimanager</a>
            <a class="label_ blue_" href="features/remote_download_manager.html">Fern-Download-Manager</a>
        </div>

            (function(){

            })();

        <div class="section features" id="features">
            <div style="position: relative">
                <h2 style="display: inline-block;text-align: left">Funktionen</h2>
            </div>
            <table class="grid" style="width: 100%">
                <thead>
                <tr><td>Funktionen</td><td style="width: 140px">Minimale Version</td></tr>
                </thead>

                <tbody>
                <tr><td>HTTP, HTTPS-Protokoll (grundlegende Funktionen wie gzip, fortsetzbar, mehrere Verbindungen werden nicht aufgelistet.)</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>FTP, FTPS-Protokoll</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Magnet, HASH-Adresse</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>BitTorrent</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Andere benutzerdefinierte Protokolle wie Donner, Flashget, qqdl</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>JSON-formatierte Adresse</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>m3u8 Stream-Aufgabe</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Stream-Aufgabe AES-128 Entschlüsselung (SAMPLE-AES Entschlüsselung wird noch nicht unterstützt)</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>HTTP-Cookie, Header, User-Agent mit Benutzeranpassung</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Torrent Seeding-Limit</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Dynamische Bearbeitung der Transfer-Aufgaben-Konfiguration</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Anti-Leeches</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Abgelaufene Adresse aktualisieren</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Kataloge</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Download-, Upload-Geschwindigkeit begrenzen</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Benutzerdefinierte Adresse erstellen (filec, fileu)</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Proxy-Verwaltung</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Filter anpassen</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Tracker-Verwaltung</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Aufgabendetails</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Torrent aus Aufgabe exportieren</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Mehrsprachig</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Warteschlange oder unbegrenzte Nebenläufigkeitseinstellung</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Chrome-Browser-Integration</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Firefox-Browser-Integration</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Videos, Audio von der Webseite erfassen</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Alle Magnete von der Webseite finden</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Übersetzungstool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>HTTP-Tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>URI codieren/dekodieren Werkzeug</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Base64 codieren/dekodieren Werkzeug</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Regex-Test-Tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Torrent erstellen</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Torrent zu Magnet-Tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Magnet zu Torrent-Tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Datei-Merge-Tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Statistiken</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Alle Links von der Webseite herunterladen</td><td>1.6</td></tr>
                <tr><td>SSH, SFTP-Protokoll</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>curl, wget, aria2, axel Befehlszeile</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>WebDAV-Protokoll</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Datei hochladen</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Verzeichnis hochladen</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Verzeichnis herunterladen</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Voll funktionsfähiger WebDAV(s) Dateimanager</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Voll funktionsfähiger FTP(s) Dateimanager</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Voll funktionsfähiger SSH(sftp) Dateimanager</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Dateibrowser-Persistent-Caches</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Website-Regeln</td><td>2.1</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Checksummen-Tool</td><td>2.3</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Fern-Download</td><td>2.6</td></tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>
        </div>

            <h2>Benutzerbewertungen</h2>

            <div class="user_review">
                <div class="title_">
                    <h4>File Centipede - A download tool with more features than you can handle</h4>
                </div>
                <div class="desc_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://www.wfdownloader.xyz/blog/file-centipede-a-download-tool-with-more-features-than-you-can-handle">
                        Recently, I found a download manager that caught my attention and is worth talking about. It's called File Centipede.
                        It's more than just a download manager. It has so many features that even power users like me found it impressive.
                        What's more, it's free, open-source, clean, cross-platform
                        ...
                    </a>
                </div>
                <div class="name_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://www.wfdownloader.xyz/">WFDownloader</a>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="user_review">
                <div class="title_">
                    <h4>This Internet file download manager comes equipped with enhanced features and offers support for a wide range of download sources</h4>
                </div>
                <div class="desc_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://www.softpedia.com/get/Internet/Download-Managers/File-Centipede.shtmle">
                        Right from the start, we noticed the logical and well-thought design of the layout, which relies on a series of panels and tabs for providing the available tools and various information. One can, at a single glance preview downloading content
                        ...
                    </a>
                </div>
                <div class="name_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://www.softpedia.com">softpedia</a>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="user_review">
                <div class="title_">
                    <h4>HTTP、FTP、magnet、torrent、m3u8 などのプロトコルに対応しているダウンロードマネージャ</h4>
                </div>
                <div class="desc_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://softaro.net/file-centipede/">
                        File Centipede は、HTTP / HTTPS、FTP / FTPS、magnet や torrent、m3u8 などのプロトコルに対応している、使いやすくカスタマイズが可能なダウンロードマネージャです。

                        便利な機能が多数含まれており、広告なしで無料で、オーディオやビデオのダウンロードにも使用できます。このダウンロードマネージャを使用すると、 Web サイトからのダウンロード速度を向上できます
                        ...
                    </a>
                </div>
                <div class="name_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://softaro.net/">softaro</a>
                </div>
            </div>

    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){

            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>

            </div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Linux Download-Manager</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
<p>File Centipede is the best Linux download manager.</p>
<p>It's the only one that supports all mainstream protocols and the video sniffer's Linux download manager.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_add_task.png" alt="file centipede add task">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
It also contains tons of auxiliary tools like file-merge, checksum, base64-encoder, URI-encoder, and magnet-to-torrent......
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_file_merge.png" alt="file merge">
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_checksum_tool.png" alt="file checksum">
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_magnet2torrent.png" alt="magnet to torrent">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
You can also use it to manage remote files like WebDAV, FTP, and SSH.
            </div>
            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_webdav.png" alt="file centipede remote file manager" width="800">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
It's very easy to install, only need one click, and it has no other dynamic libraries requirement, even Glibc.
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Herunterladen</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Teilen</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

<script>
    load_sponsors = function(list)
    {
        if(!(list instanceof Array)){
            return;
        }
        var tbody = document.getElementById("sponsors_tbody");

        for(var i=0;i<list.length;++i)
        {
            var row     = list[i];
            var tr      = document.createElement("tr");
            var name    = document.createElement("td");
            var logo    = document.createElement("td");
            var text    = document.createElement("td");
            var balance = document.createElement("td");

            logo.innerHTML    = "<img src='http://w.filecxx.com/tpl/"+row.logo+"' style='max-height: 150px;max-width: 250px'>";
            text.innerText    = row.text;
            name.innerText    = row.name;
            balance.innerHTML = row.balance;

            tr.appendChild(logo);
            tr.appendChild(text);
            tr.appendChild(name);
            tr.appendChild(balance);

            tbody.appendChild(tr);
        }
    }
</script>
<script src="https://w.filecxx.com/action.php?act=sponsors&callback=load_sponsors"></script>
<script src="../script/base.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};
        t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script>

                <a class="button" href="../release/chrome.zip">Download-Link2</a>
            </div>
            <div class="platform_">
                <h4>Chrome Manifest V3</h4>
                <a class="button" href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/raw/main/release/chrome_mv3.zip">Download-Link1</a>
                <a class="button" href="../release/chrome_mv3.zip">Download-Link2</a>
                <a class="button" href="https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ogfhebakocdbenmnkaajmckmbcnnafmm" target="_blank">Online-Installation</a>
            </div>

            <div class="platform_">
                <h4>Github</h4>
                <a class="button" target="_blank" href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede">https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede</a>
            </div>
            <div class="platform_">
                <h4>PAD (Portable Application Description)</h4>
                <a class="button" target="_blank" href="/release/FileCentipede_pad.xml">File Centipede PAD.xml</a>
            </div>

        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="section">
        <h2>Kostenlose Version - Herunterladen</h2>
        <div class="detail_">
            <div class="version_">
                Neueste Version:
                <b>1.9</b>
                <span style="color: green">(2022.03.27)</span>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="platforms_">

================
File: de_DE/update_log.html
================
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">

    <title>Update-Protokoll - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../style/base.css">
    <style>
        li{
            font-size: 16px;
            padding: 4px 8px 4px 8px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="index.html#">Startseite</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="index.html#features">Funktionen</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="download.html">Herunterladen</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="screenshot.html">Screenshot</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="index.html#user_reviews">Benutzerbewertungen</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="documentation.html">Dokumentation</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">Deutsch</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>


    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Update-Protokoll</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.82 (uptime: 2023.02.06)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Fully shutdown.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>When the remote HTTP server sends error data without disconnecting, causing this segment of data not to be downloaded and the final file size to not match the remote one, this scenario is likely to occur when the remote connection is unstable or frequently switches proxy IPs.</p>
            <p>When downloading a file from the file browser, the file save path follows the catalog instead of the user choosing one.</p>
            <p>The browser extension gets the wrong cookies from the incognito window.</p>

            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>Change the default parallel option to "Fastest".</p>
            <p>FileCXX private DHT network module (libdybn) has been removed, using BitTorrent public DHT network as the alternate.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.81 (uptime: 2023.1.6)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Language: Tiếng Việt</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTP task infinite redirect when reading partial content gets 301 code.</p>
            <p>When downloading a large number of small files, repeatedly stopping or deleting tasks may cause errors in tasks that are waiting in the queue, indirectly causing filec to crash.</p>
            <p>When the taskbar tray icon is clicked, the window does not become the top window.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.8 stable (uptime: 2022.12.31)</h3>
            <p>
                This is the last version of FileCentipede2. The development of the next major version 3.0 has started.<br/><br/>
                If you have any feature requests, please post them on
                <a href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/discussions/402">https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/discussions/402</a>
            </p>

            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.8</p>
            <p>Language file "ru_RU.lang" updated.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>URL directory parse error, such as "http://localhost/a=1&b=/dir/file".</p>
            <p>The FTP task becomes stuck in the stopping state if the connection fails.</p>
            <p>Unable to receive FTP file list when remote FTP server sends code 226 before sending the file list.</p>
            <p>The browser extension shows "Send failed" when getting an URL that starts with "blob:".</p>
            <p>The browser extension sometimes fails to obtain the cookie information for a URL.</p>
            <p>A new strategy for downloading protected m3u8 segments.</p>
            <p>In some cases, the downloaded file is m3u8 content instead of a video.</p>
            <p>m3u8 png segments.</p>
            <p>m3u8 parsing segment URL lost the last character when the m3u8 file did not end with a newline.</p>
            <p>Use "filename*=UTF-8" as the preferred filename instead of "filename=".</p>
            <p>The "Blocks" from the detail panel are displayed reversely when the HTTP task is not resumable.</p>
            <p>Unlocked variables caused the filec process to crash.</p>
            <p>The settings from the 'Update-dialog' cannot be saved.</p>
            <p>Display an error message when the remote client fails to connect.</p>
            <p>Increase the SSH maximum connect timeout to 120 seconds, rather than the current 12 seconds.</p>
            <p>filec crashes if the remote HTTP response headers include both 'content-range' and 'transfer-encoding' at the same time.</p>
            <p>When downloading multiple files with the same file name but different contents simultaneously, the automatic renaming function may potentially cause errors in writing to the files due to a lack of locking, indirectly causing filec to crash.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.7 (uptime: 2022.08.29)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>URI generator (from URI tool)</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>thread deadlock</p>
            <p>unable to download files when HTTP server response conflicted headers: Accept-Ranges, Content-Range, Content-Encoding</p>
            <p>unable to download files when HTTP server response transfer_encoding is chunked with 0-byte data</p>
            <p>magnet-task causing filec crashes during multiple times of adding and canceling.</p>
            <p>ESC key on dialog</p>
            <p>duplicate shortcut key</p>
            <p>fileu dialog crashes</p>
            <p>fileu status bar DHT number was inaccurate.</p>
            <p>remote client crashes on windows 7</p>
            <p>torrent-task directory icon missed after restarting filec</p>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.6 & 2.61 (uptime: 2022.08.21)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Remote download manager (NativeUI, not WebUI)</p>
            <p>File browser: copy file URL, path</p>
            <p>Command line: service_port, service_password, remote_access</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.7</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>(2.61) downgrade wolfssl to 5.4.0 </p>
            <p>Cannot save options from the software's update dialog.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when deleting an SSH or FTP directory and then canceling it.</p>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.5 (uptime: 2022.08.13)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Save column width.</p>
            <p>Save window position. (default: off)</p>
            <p>Force restart</p>
            <p>Add trackers from the subscribed list.</p>
            <p>Command line: create_torrent</p>
            <p>Language: português</p>
            <p>Translation tool: select languages directory</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>When remote HTTP server received range: bytes=0-0, but continue response more data, causing task progress over 100%.</p>
            <p>Max Connect timeout up to 120s instead of 12s</p>
            <p>File name incomplete when remote HTTP server response header field content-disposition contains multiple "=?UTF8?B?" sections.</p>
            <p>Auto upgrade software.</p>
        </div>


        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.4 (uptime: 2022.08.02)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Tray icon event for windows.</p>
            <p>Set all new tasks save-path from the Add-task-dialog.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>After pausing and resuming an HTTP task, the task progress reset to 0.</p>
            <p>Auto-created host's default config error when entering address from the file browser's address bar.</p>
            <p>File browser extracts username and password from URL.</p>
            <p>Remove the default path "/" from the file browser.</p>
            <p>Remove the checkbox from torrent confirm-dialog when the torrent only has one file.</p>
            <p>Torrent confirm-dialog file size missing when the torrent only has one file.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.3 (uptime: 2022.08.01)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Browser extension up to 1.5, massively optimized, it can extract videos from javascript.</p>
            <p>File checksum tool (text, file, directory).</p>
            <p>File size filter for torrent-task.</p>
            <p>Taskbar progress for windows</p>
            <p>Alert setting: delete task</p>
            <p>Alert setting: delete catalog</p>
            <p>Stream-task settings: Base URL, Key, IV</p>
            <p>Merge tool: video+audio merge (FFmpeg required)</p>
            <p>Language Français</p>
            <p>Language Nederlands</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>announce_to_all_tiers and announce_to_all_trackers set as default.</p>
            <p>HTTPS trackers (Linux)</p>
            <p>filec crashes when HTTP cookies over 4 KB.</p>
            <p>Convert URI space to "%20" instead of "+"</p>
            <p>m3u8 merge files error on windows7</p>
            <p>uploaded directories displayed as regular files from the file browser.</p>
            <p>SSH connections timed out but the state was still connected.</p>
            <p>SSH file manager "operation failed" error.</p>
            <p>When resuming an HTTP task and the URL address was expired causing an incomplete file to be downloaded. (New bug since 2.0)</p>
            <p>Torrent-task inaccurate statistics.</p>
            <p>Torrent-task rename from confirm-dialog failed.</p>
            <p>m3u8 parse error.</p>
            <p>Clipboard multiple triggers.</p>
            <p>HTTP-task filename with =?UTF-8?B?</p>
            <p>fileu incomplete task list (fully fixed).</p>
            <p>fileu directory icon.</p>
            <p>fileu window randomly activated.</p>
            <p>DHT 0</p>
            <p>...</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.21 (uptime: 2022.07.02)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>stream-task 401, 403 error.</p>
            <p>stream-task HTTP 302 redirect causing filec crashes.</p>
            <p>stream-task merge file error after pausing and resuming the task.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.2 (uptime: 2022.06.30)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>torrent port setting</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>"CheckBox" for torrent-task subdirectories</p>
            <p>torrent-task state display as completed but still seeding.</p>
            <p>torrent-task lost the resume-data in some cases.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.1 (uptime: 2022.06.29)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>site rules</p>
            <p>language zh_TW</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>WebDAV default config error for file downloading.</p>
            <p>torrent-task is not able to stop when checking files.</p>
            <p>when the HTTP server response code is 401 or 403, remove the "Referer" and "Origin" fields from HTTP headers before resending the HTTP request.</p>
            <p>some web servers accepted HTTP range requests but the response code is 200 with 0-byte content, instead of 201, causing a 0-byte file to be downloaded. (wingftp)</p>
            <p>torrent-task files rename failed after multiple tries.</p>
            <p>FTP server 504 error (CLNT, OPTS UTF8 ON).</p>
            <p>DateTime 0.000000.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.02 (uptime: 2022.06.25)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>redundant path separator</p>
            <p>XML tag case-sensitive caused the WebDAV list directory to fail.</p>
            <p>file has not been removed from the file browser list when the remote directory path is  /</p>
            <p>when uploading/downloading a directory max connections have been reduced when the directory contains a small file.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.0/2.01 (uptime: 2022.06.24)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>opening a task file show an alert when the file has been deleted or moved.</p>
            <p>context-menu for torrent confirm-dialog</p>
            <p>supported command line: curl, wget, aria2, axel</p>
            <p>option: silent mode</p>
            <p>detail panel: blocks</p>
            <p>detail panel: connections</p>
            <p>protocol: SSH(sftp)</p>
            <p>option: proxy modes (Always, If_Available, Round_Robin, Round_Robin_Connections)</p>
            <p>option: no task record</p>
            <p>option: parallel (smooth, fastest)</p>
            <p>settings: stream task</p>
            <p>settings: SSH</p>
            <p>settings: File Browser</p>
            <p>download directory & upload directory</p>
            <p>file browser, network file manager for WebDAV, WebDAVS, FTP, FTPS, SSH(SFTP)</p>
            <p>...</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>filec fails to start when the database file is broken.</p>
            <p>global-speed-limit settings for stream tasks.</p>
            <p>file icon association error on windows.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when the service receives an empty request.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when the local network is unavailable.</p>
            <p>ftp compatibility for non-standard server.</p>
            <p>HTTP cookie containing a "secure" field case endless loop.</p>
            <p>when add-task dialog switching the URL config causing fields are missed.</p>
            <p>stream-task missing completed dialog.</p>
            <p>tasks-detail update data is in slow motion.</p>
            <p>tray icon show/hide fails in some case.</p>
            <p>http-task state frozen when the response body is empty.</p>
            <p>torrent-confirm dialog information error.</p>
            <p>an invalid file is downloaded when the HTTP response code is 206 and the keep-alive is false.</p>
            <p>incomplete encoded URI path.</p>
            <p>encode URI path before sending the HTTP header.</p>
            <p>stream-task HTTP response code 474 marked as server busy.</p>
            <p>copy address from task error (std::string_view out of scope).</p>
            <p>an empty file was downloaded when the HTTP response headers contained content-encoding and content-range.</p>
            <p>"Host" field in HTTP headers.</p>
            <p>translation tool: Israel has been removed from the Arabic countries list.</p>
            <p>heap-use-after-free.</p>
            <p>uncaught exceptions.</p>
            <p>memory overflowed.</p>
            <p>...</p>
            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>few</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.9 (uptime: 2022.03.27)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>The downloaded file is 1 byte when the HTTP header field "content-range" did not contain the "bytes" string</p>
            <p>HTTP request range limitations</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.8 (uptime: 2022.03.26)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Ignore this site -> browser extensions</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.4</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>The rename dialog is behind the confirm-dialog (windows only)</p>
            <p>Open directory did not work when save-path is the root directory (windows only)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.7 (uptime: 2022.03.25)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Add context menu on confirm-links dialog</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>Process filec.exe froze when HTTP response header no charset and "attachment;filename=" contains a non-utf8 string (windows only, caused by MinGW)</p>
            <p>Not able to change proxy on task-edit dialog</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.6 (uptime: 2022.03.25)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Sound effects when task download completed or error. (optional)</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.3</p>
            <p>Download all links from the web page</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>UI configs are lost when upgrading to a new version.</p>
            <p>On windows7, fileu std::filesystem::path error (caused by MinGW).</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.5 (uptime: 2022.03.22)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>File last modified time from HTTP server</p>
            <p>Show HTTP, Torrent confirming-dialog on top</p>
            <p>Task completed dialog</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>302 redirect on stream task</p>
            <p>Datetime format changed from GTM to ISO YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss</p>
            <p>fileu.exe is hidden when launched from Windows system service. (from browser extension after reboot)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.4 (uptime: 2022.03.20)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Add/Remove User agents.</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTP tasks lost 1 byte after during pause and restart the task. (critical)</p>
            <p>Some websites have HTTP range request limitations, auto-ban small range requests, cause download errors.</p>
            <p>History path</p>
            <p>Windows DPI</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.3 (uptime: 2022.03.18)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Users can change the software name during installation.</p>
            <p>Switch download manager from browser extension popup panel.</p>
            <p>Show confirm-dialog when tasks are sent from the web browser.</p>
            <p>Add new option "Without confirm" to HTTP settings</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTPS request fails when the port is not 443</p>
            <p>The translation tool inserted redundant backslashes into the string</p>
            <p>System service from settings is enabled when installing without system service</p>
            <p>Add 5 DHT bootstrap nodes</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.2 (uptime: 2022.03.16)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>filec.exe fails to start when the desktop environment is non-English (windows only)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.1 (uptime: 2022.03.15)</h3>

            <p>save window size</p>
            <p>auto add trackers to the new task (including downloads)</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>few</p>

            (uninstall before installing the new version)
        </div>

<script>
    (function(){
        var list      = document.getElementById("codes").innerText.split('\n');
        var code_list = document.getElementById("code_list");
        var number    = 0;

        for(var i=0;i<list.length;++i)
        {
            var text = list[i].trim();

            if(text.length === 0){
                continue;
            }
            var item = document.createElement("div");

            if(number++ % 2 === 0){
                item.className = "code_time";
            }else{
                item.className = "code_text";
            }
            item.innerText = text;
            code_list.appendChild(item);
        }
    })();
</script>
<script src="../script/base.js"></script>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>How to install Browser extension</h1>
            <br/>This web browser extension can be used to replace the browser's default download tool. <br/><br/>The extension can capture videos and audio from the web page, it supports m3u8 HTTP stream video download and auto-merge, it supports auto decrypting most encryption videos, and it supports getting all magnet links from the web page.<br/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_video_bar.png'/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_videos.png'/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_audios.png'/>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h2>How to install Firefox Browser extension</h2>
            <div>
                <h4>Open:</h4> about:addons
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Drop firefox.xpi File Into
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons_drop.png'/>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons_add.png'/>
            </div>

        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h2>How to install Chrome Browser extension</h2>
            <div>
                <h4>Open:</h4> chrome://extensions/

                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_menu.png'/>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_menu2.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Enable Developer mode
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_extension_dev_mode.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Drop chrome.crx File Into
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_drop.png'/>

                <h3>Or:</h3>
                Unzip chrome.zip
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_unzip.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Load unpacked <b></b>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_load_unpacked.png'/>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Share</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>

        <div class="languages_">

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Create address</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h2>Javascript</h2>
            <p>If you are running a website.</p>
            <p>Insert this script into your web page, or put the script code into your web page, but the better way is to put the script on your website, in case this website is not online.</p>
            <div>
                <pre><xmp><script1 src="//filecxx.com/script/create_filec_address.js"></script1></xmp></pre>
            </div>
            <div>
                <a href="../../script/create_filec_address.js">Download script</a>
            </div>

            <div>
                <h3>Usage:</h3>
                <p>
                    Pass a JSON into create_filec_address function, json fields see
                    <a href="#json_fields">JSON</a>
                </p>
                <pre><code>create_filec_address({uri:"http://...."});</code></pre>
            </div>

            <div>
                <h4>Sample:</h4>
                <a href="fileu:0eyJ1cmkiOiJodHRwczovL2dpdGh1Yi5jb20vZmlsZWN4eC9GaWxlQ2VudGlwZWRlL3Jhdy9tYWluL3JlbGVhc2UvY2hyb21lLmNyeCJ9">
                    fileu:0eyJ1cmkiOiJodHRwczovL2dpdGh1Yi5jb20vZmlsZWN4eC9GaWxlQ2VudGlwZWRlL3Jhdy9tYWluL3JlbGVhc2UvY2hyb21lLmNyeCJ9
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div style="margin-top: 24px">
                <p>
                    If you like to hide your real address from users or give some limitations for user download, you should use the \"create address\" tool from software, it can generate an encrypted address.
                </p>
                <p>
                    (Javascript is not able to create an encrypted address.)
                </p>
            </div>
            <div>
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_create_address.png" alt="Create address">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section json_keys" id="json_fields">
            <h2>JSON: Add task</h2>
            <div>
                You can use JSON as an address to add a task, but remember, the JSON string must on one line.
                <br/>
                <br/>
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_add_json_task.png" alt="">
            </div>

            <table class="grid" style="margin-top: 12px">
                <thead>
                <tr>
                    <td>Key</td>
                    <td>Type</td>
                    <td style="width: 140px">Description</td>
                </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                <tr>
                    <td>uri</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Address</td>
                </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>

            <h4>HTTP / HTTPS / Stream Optional</h4>
            <table class="grid" style="margin-top: 12px">
                <thead>
                <tr>
                    <td>Key</td>
                    <td>Type</td>
                    <td style="width: 140px">Description</td>
                </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                <tr>
                    <td>method</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>GET, POST ... You know the thing</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>

                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Catalog</td>
                </tr>

                <p>3. 
Click the create torrent button, and save the created torrent file.</p>

            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>

                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>

</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>How to download files</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>1. Click the add button from the software.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/how_to_download_1.png"></p>

                <p>2. Enter or paste the file URI address to the EditBox.</p>
                <p>3. Click the download now button.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_add_task.png"></p>

                <p>4. Or, use the browser extension to download files through the web browser..</p>

                <p>
                    <a href="browser_integration.html">How to install Browser extension</a>
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
