    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">English</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>How to get file checksum</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>
                    
File Centipede provided a file checksum tool located on the software menu -> tools -> Checksum
                </p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_tool_checksum.png" alt="File Centipede Checksum">
                </p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_checksum_tool.png" alt="Checksum tool">
                </p>

            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Command line</h3>
                <div>
                    <p>fileu --checksum Path</p>
                    <p>filec md5 Path</p>
                    <p>filec crc32 Path</p>
                    <p>filec sha1 Path</p>
                    <p>filec sha256 Path</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Share</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">Home</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">Features</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">Download</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">Screenshot</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">User reviews</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">Documentation</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">English</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>How to increase download speed</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
For the HTTP task, the default parallel setting is smooth, but you can change it to fastest, it could increase your download speed and save your time about 1-30 seconds.</p>
                <p>
But changing it to the fastest may cause your IP address to be blocked by the remote server. (low probability)</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_settings_http.png" alt="File Centipede HTTP setting"></p>
                <p>
For the Torrent task, you can add trackers to increase your download & upload speed.
But the condition is other peers are using the same tracker and downloading or uploading the same file.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_software_task_add_tracker.png" width="800" alt="File Centipede Torrent tracker"></p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Share</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

        <div class="languages_">

            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>

                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>How to install File Centipede</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>1. unzip the downloaded zip file.</p>
                <p>2. click fileu from the directory.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/fileu_exe.png"></p>
                <p>3. click the install button.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_install.png" alt="How to install File Centipede"></p>
                <p>4. install done.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Command line</h3>
                <p>
                    filec -i system_service
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Share</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>1. Click help from the software menu.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help.png"></p>
                <p>2. Click the Uninstall item.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_uninstall.png"></p>
                <p>3. Click the Uninstall button.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_uninstall_btn.png"></p>
                <p>4. Delete the software directory.</p>
            </div>

                <p>

        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">English</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>

                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>FTP file manager</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede is also an FTP file manager, it can download & upload files from an FTP server, including directories or the whole FTP site.</p>
                <p>
It's very easy to use, you don't need to input tons of settings, you just need to enter the host address into the address bar.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_ftp.png" width="800" alt="FTP file manager">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
To maximize the speed of listing directory files,
File Centipede can cache all directory files you have visited, the next time you list the same directory will be like opening a local directory.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Download</a>
        </div>

File: en_US/features/remote_download_manager.html

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>Remote download manager - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../style/base.css" />
    <script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};
        t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script> 

</head>
<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">Home</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">Features</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">Download</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">Screenshot</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">User reviews</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">Documentation</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">English</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Remote download manager</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>File centipede provided a native user interface for remote file downloading.</p>
                <p>It's located on the main menu called <b>remote</b>.</p>
                <p>It's very simple to use. You just need to input the remote host's IP/domain address, then click the host from the menu item you just added.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_remote_add.png" alt="add remote host">
                </p>
                <p>If you want your computer to be connectable, your need to open the Setting -> Service, and toggle the <b>Remote access</b> to the <b>enable</b>. and don't forget to set a password.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_settings_enable_remote_access.png" alt="enable remote access">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Command line</h3>
                <p>filec remote_access on</p>
                <p>filec service_port 10111</p>
                <p>filec service_password your_password</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Download</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Share</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>SSH file manager</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede is also an SSH file manager, it can download & upload files from an SSH server, including directories or the whole SSH site.</p>
                <p>
It's very easy to use, you don't need to input tons of settings, you just need to enter the host address into the address bar.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_ssh.png" width="800" alt="SSH file manager">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
To maximize the speed of listing directory files,
File Centipede can cache all directory files you have visited, the next time you list the same directory will be like opening a local directory.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Download</a>
        </div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Video downloader</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede can download videos from more than 99% of websites.</p>
                <p>
It even can analyze video addresses from Javascript, and extract decrypted video-key from Javascript closure.
For some special websites, only File Centipede is able to download its video.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
It provided two easy ways to download videos or audio from the webpage.
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
1: Download from the floating bar beside of video.</p>
            </div>

            <div>
                <img src="../../images/extension_video_bar.png" alt="download web video">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <p class="article_">
2: Download from the popup window.</p>
            <div>
                <img src="../../images/extension_videos.png" alt="download web videos from popup">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../documentation/browser_integration.html" class="article_">How to install Browser extension</a>
        </div>

        </div>

    <meta name="description" content="File centipede is an All-In-One internet file upload/download manager, BitTorrent Client, WebDAV client, FTP client, and SSH client. It is designed to be fast, customizable, and user-friendly. It supports multi-protocols and contains many useful auxiliary tools such as HTTP requester, file merge, and encoders. With the browser integration, you can download audio and videos from websites, even encrypted videos."/>
    <meta name="keywords" content="File Centipede, Internet download manager, Torrent client, Torrents download manager, Download videos from web, Fastest download accelerator, Best download manager, Linux download manager, Free download manager, WebDAV client, FTP client, SSH(SFTP) client"/>

            <h2>Description</h2>
            <div id="description_text">File centipede is an All-In-One internet file upload/download manager, BitTorrent Client, WebDAV client, FTP client, and SSH client. It is designed to be fast, customizable, and user-friendly. It supports multi-protocols and contains many useful auxiliary tools such as HTTP requester, file merge, and encoders. With the browser integration, you can download audio and videos from websites, even encrypted videos.</div>
        </div>

            <a class="label_ blue_" href="os/linux_download_manager.html">Linux download manager</a>

            <a class="label_ blue_" href="features/remote_download_manager.html">Remote download manager</a>

        <div class="section features" id="features">
            <div style="position: relative">
                <h2 style="display: inline-block;text-align: left">Features</h2>
            </div>
            <table class="grid" style="width: 100%">
                <thead>
                <tr><td>Features</td><td style="width: 140px">Minimum version</td></tr>
                </thead>

                <tbody>
                <tr><td>HTTP,HTTPS protocol (basic features like gzip, resumable, multi-connections will not be listed.)</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>FTP, FTPS protocol</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Magnet, HASH address</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>BitTorrent</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Other custom protocols like thunder, flashget, qqdl</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>JSON formatted address</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>m3u8 stream task</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Stream task AES-128 decryption (SAMPLE-AES decryption is not supported yet)</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>HTTP cookie, header, user-agent with user customize</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Torrent seeding limit</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Dynamically edit transfer-task config</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Anti leeches</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Refresh expired address</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Catalogs</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Limit download, upload speed</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Create custom address (filec, fileu)</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Proxy management</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Filter customize</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Tracker management</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Task details</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Export torrent from task</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Multi-languages</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Queue or Unlimited concurrency setting</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Chrome Browser integration</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Firefox Browser integration</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Capture videos, audio from web page</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Find all magnets from web page</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Translate tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>HTTP tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>URI encode/decode tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Base64 encode/decode tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Regex test tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Create torrent</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Torrent to magnet tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Magnet to torrent tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>File merge tool</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Statistics</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Download all links from webpage</td><td>1.6</td></tr>
                <tr><td>SSH, SFTP protocol</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>curl, wget, aria2, axel command line</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>WebDAV protocol</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Upload file</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Upload directory</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Download directory</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Full-featured WebDAV(s) file manager</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Full-featured FTP(s) file manager</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Full-featured SSH(sftp) file manager</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>File browser persistent caches</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Site rules</td><td>2.1</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Checksum tool</td><td>2.3</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Remote download</td><td>2.6</td></tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>
        </div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Linux download manager</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
<p>File Centipede is the best Linux download manager.</p>
<p>It's the only one that supports all mainstream protocols and the video sniffer's Linux download manager.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_add_task.png" alt="file centipede add task">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
It also contains tons of auxiliary tools like file-merge, checksum, base64-encoder, URI-encoder, and magnet-to-torrent......
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_file_merge.png" alt="file merge">
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_checksum_tool.png" alt="file checksum">
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_magnet2torrent.png" alt="magnet to torrent">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
You can also use it to manage remote files like WebDAV, FTP, and SSH.
            </div>
            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_webdav.png" alt="file centipede remote file manager" width="800">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
It's very easy to install, only need one click, and it has no other dynamic libraries requirement, even Glibc.
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Download</a>
        </div>

<script>
    load_sponsors = function(list)
    {
        if(!(list instanceof Array)){
            return;
        }
        var tbody = document.getElementById("sponsors_tbody");

        for(var i=0;i<list.length;++i)
        {
            var row     = list[i];
            var tr      = document.createElement("tr");
            var name    = document.createElement("td");
            var logo    = document.createElement("td");
            var text    = document.createElement("td");
            var balance = document.createElement("td");

            logo.innerHTML    = "<img src='http://w.filecxx.com/tpl/"+row.logo+"' style='max-height: 150px;max-width: 250px'>";
            text.innerText    = row.text;
            name.innerText    = row.name;
            balance.innerHTML = row.balance;

            tr.appendChild(logo);
            tr.appendChild(text);
            tr.appendChild(name);
            tr.appendChild(balance);

            tbody.appendChild(tr);
        }
    }
</script>
<script src="https://w.filecxx.com/action.php?act=sponsors&callback=load_sponsors"></script>
<script src="../script/base.js"></script>

        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script> 

</body>

File: en_US/update_log.html
================
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">

    <title>Update log - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../style/base.css">
    <style>
        li{
            font-size: 16px;
            padding: 4px 8px 4px 8px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="index.html#">Home</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="index.html#features">Features</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="download.html">Download</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="screenshot.html">Screenshot</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="index.html#user_reviews">User reviews</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="documentation.html">Documentation</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">English</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>


    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Update log</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.82 (uptime: 2023.02.06)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Fully shutdown.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>When the remote HTTP server sends error data without disconnecting, causing this segment of data not to be downloaded and the final file size to not match the remote one, this scenario is likely to occur when the remote connection is unstable or frequently switches proxy IPs.</p>
            <p>When downloading a file from the file browser, the file save path follows the catalog instead of the user choosing one.</p>
            <p>The browser extension gets the wrong cookies from the incognito window.</p>

            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>Change the default parallel option to "Fastest".</p>
            <p>FileCXX private DHT network module (libdybn) has been removed, using BitTorrent public DHT network as the alternate.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.81 (uptime: 2023.1.6)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Language: Tiếng Việt</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTP task infinite redirect when reading partial content gets 301 code.</p>
            <p>When downloading a large number of small files, repeatedly stopping or deleting tasks may cause errors in tasks that are waiting in the queue, indirectly causing filec to crash.</p>
            <p>When the taskbar tray icon is clicked, the window does not become the top window.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.8 stable (uptime: 2022.12.31)</h3>
            <p>
                This is the last version of FileCentipede2. The development of the next major version 3.0 has started.<br/><br/>
                If you have any feature requests, please post them on
                <a href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/discussions/402">https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/discussions/402</a>
            </p>

            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.8</p>
            <p>Language file "ru_RU.lang" updated.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>URL directory parse error, such as "http://localhost/a=1&b=/dir/file".</p>
            <p>The FTP task becomes stuck in the stopping state if the connection fails.</p>
            <p>Unable to receive FTP file list when remote FTP server sends code 226 before sending the file list.</p>
            <p>The browser extension shows "Send failed" when getting an URL that starts with "blob:".</p>
            <p>The browser extension sometimes fails to obtain the cookie information for a URL.</p>
            <p>A new strategy for downloading protected m3u8 segments.</p>
            <p>In some cases, the downloaded file is m3u8 content instead of a video.</p>
            <p>m3u8 png segments.</p>
            <p>m3u8 parsing segment URL lost the last character when the m3u8 file did not end with a newline.</p>
            <p>Use "filename*=UTF-8" as the preferred filename instead of "filename=".</p>
            <p>The "Blocks" from the detail panel are displayed reversely when the HTTP task is not resumable.</p>
            <p>Unlocked variables caused the filec process to crash.</p>
            <p>The settings from the 'Update-dialog' cannot be saved.</p>
            <p>Display an error message when the remote client fails to connect.</p>
            <p>Increase the SSH maximum connect timeout to 120 seconds, rather than the current 12 seconds.</p>
            <p>filec crashes if the remote HTTP response headers include both 'content-range' and 'transfer-encoding' at the same time.</p>
            <p>When downloading multiple files with the same file name but different contents simultaneously, the automatic renaming function may potentially cause errors in writing to the files due to a lack of locking, indirectly causing filec to crash.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.7 (uptime: 2022.08.29)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>URI generator (from URI tool)</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>thread deadlock</p>
            <p>unable to download files when HTTP server response conflicted headers: Accept-Ranges, Content-Range, Content-Encoding</p>
            <p>unable to download files when HTTP server response transfer_encoding is chunked with 0-byte data</p>
            <p>magnet-task causing filec crashes during multiple times of adding and canceling.</p>
            <p>ESC key on dialog</p>
            <p>duplicate shortcut key</p>
            <p>fileu dialog crashes</p>
            <p>fileu status bar DHT number was inaccurate.</p>
            <p>remote client crashes on windows 7</p>
            <p>torrent-task directory icon missed after restarting filec</p>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.6 & 2.61 (uptime: 2022.08.21)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Remote download manager (NativeUI, not WebUI)</p>
            <p>File browser: copy file URL, path</p>
            <p>Command line: service_port, service_password, remote_access</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.7</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>(2.61) downgrade wolfssl to 5.4.0 </p>
            <p>Cannot save options from the software's update dialog.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when deleting an SSH or FTP directory and then canceling it.</p>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.5 (uptime: 2022.08.13)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Save column width.</p>
            <p>Save window position. (default: off)</p>
            <p>Force restart</p>
            <p>Add trackers from the subscribed list.</p>
            <p>Command line: create_torrent</p>
            <p>Language: português</p>
            <p>Translation tool: select languages directory</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>When remote HTTP server received range: bytes=0-0, but continue response more data, causing task progress over 100%.</p>
            <p>Max Connect timeout up to 120s instead of 12s</p>
            <p>File name incomplete when remote HTTP server response header field content-disposition contains multiple "=?UTF8?B?" sections.</p>
            <p>Auto upgrade software.</p>
        </div>


        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.4 (uptime: 2022.08.02)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Tray icon event for windows.</p>
            <p>Set all new tasks save-path from the Add-task-dialog.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>After pausing and resuming an HTTP task, the task progress reset to 0.</p>
            <p>Auto-created host's default config error when entering address from the file browser's address bar.</p>
            <p>File browser extracts username and password from URL.</p>
            <p>Remove the default path "/" from the file browser.</p>
            <p>Remove the checkbox from torrent confirm-dialog when the torrent only has one file.</p>
            <p>Torrent confirm-dialog file size missing when the torrent only has one file.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.3 (uptime: 2022.08.01)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Browser extension up to 1.5, massively optimized, it can extract videos from javascript.</p>
            <p>File checksum tool (text, file, directory).</p>
            <p>File size filter for torrent-task.</p>
            <p>Taskbar progress for windows</p>
            <p>Alert setting: delete task</p>
            <p>Alert setting: delete catalog</p>
            <p>Stream-task settings: Base URL, Key, IV</p>
            <p>Merge tool: video+audio merge (FFmpeg required)</p>
            <p>Language Français</p>
            <p>Language Nederlands</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>announce_to_all_tiers and announce_to_all_trackers set as default.</p>
            <p>HTTPS trackers (Linux)</p>
            <p>filec crashes when HTTP cookies over 4 KB.</p>
            <p>Convert URI space to "%20" instead of "+"</p>
            <p>m3u8 merge files error on windows7</p>
            <p>uploaded directories displayed as regular files from the file browser.</p>
            <p>SSH connections timed out but the state was still connected.</p>
            <p>SSH file manager "operation failed" error.</p>
            <p>When resuming an HTTP task and the URL address was expired causing an incomplete file to be downloaded. (New bug since 2.0)</p>
            <p>Torrent-task inaccurate statistics.</p>
            <p>Torrent-task rename from confirm-dialog failed.</p>
            <p>m3u8 parse error.</p>
            <p>Clipboard multiple triggers.</p>
            <p>HTTP-task filename with =?UTF-8?B?</p>
            <p>fileu incomplete task list (fully fixed).</p>
            <p>fileu directory icon.</p>
            <p>fileu window randomly activated.</p>
            <p>DHT 0</p>
            <p>...</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.21 (uptime: 2022.07.02)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>stream-task 401, 403 error.</p>
            <p>stream-task HTTP 302 redirect causing filec crashes.</p>
            <p>stream-task merge file error after pausing and resuming the task.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.2 (uptime: 2022.06.30)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>torrent port setting</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>"CheckBox" for torrent-task subdirectories</p>
            <p>torrent-task state display as completed but still seeding.</p>
            <p>torrent-task lost the resume-data in some cases.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.1 (uptime: 2022.06.29)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>site rules</p>
            <p>language zh_TW</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>WebDAV default config error for file downloading.</p>
            <p>torrent-task is not able to stop when checking files.</p>
            <p>when the HTTP server response code is 401 or 403, remove the "Referer" and "Origin" fields from HTTP headers before resending the HTTP request.</p>
            <p>some web servers accepted HTTP range requests but the response code is 200 with 0-byte content, instead of 201, causing a 0-byte file to be downloaded. (wingftp)</p>
            <p>torrent-task files rename failed after multiple tries.</p>
            <p>FTP server 504 error (CLNT, OPTS UTF8 ON).</p>
            <p>DateTime 0.000000.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.02 (uptime: 2022.06.25)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>redundant path separator</p>
            <p>XML tag case-sensitive caused the WebDAV list directory to fail.</p>
            <p>file has not been removed from the file browser list when the remote directory path is  /</p>
            <p>when uploading/downloading a directory max connections have been reduced when the directory contains a small file.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.0/2.01 (uptime: 2022.06.24)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>opening a task file show an alert when the file has been deleted or moved.</p>
            <p>context-menu for torrent confirm-dialog</p>
            <p>supported command line: curl, wget, aria2, axel</p>
            <p>option: silent mode</p>
            <p>detail panel: blocks</p>
            <p>detail panel: connections</p>
            <p>protocol: SSH(sftp)</p>
            <p>option: proxy modes (Always, If_Available, Round_Robin, Round_Robin_Connections)</p>
            <p>option: no task record</p>
            <p>option: parallel (smooth, fastest)</p>
            <p>settings: stream task</p>
            <p>settings: SSH</p>
            <p>settings: File Browser</p>
            <p>download directory & upload directory</p>
            <p>file browser, network file manager for WebDAV, WebDAVS, FTP, FTPS, SSH(SFTP)</p>
            <p>...</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>filec fails to start when the database file is broken.</p>
            <p>global-speed-limit settings for stream tasks.</p>
            <p>file icon association error on windows.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when the service receives an empty request.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when the local network is unavailable.</p>
            <p>ftp compatibility for non-standard server.</p>
            <p>HTTP cookie containing a "secure" field case endless loop.</p>
            <p>when add-task dialog switching the URL config causing fields are missed.</p>
            <p>stream-task missing completed dialog.</p>
            <p>tasks-detail update data is in slow motion.</p>
            <p>tray icon show/hide fails in some case.</p>
            <p>http-task state frozen when the response body is empty.</p>
            <p>torrent-confirm dialog information error.</p>
            <p>an invalid file is downloaded when the HTTP response code is 206 and the keep-alive is false.</p>
            <p>incomplete encoded URI path.</p>
            <p>encode URI path before sending the HTTP header.</p>
            <p>stream-task HTTP response code 474 marked as server busy.</p>
            <p>copy address from task error (std::string_view out of scope).</p>
            <p>an empty file was downloaded when the HTTP response headers contained content-encoding and content-range.</p>
            <p>"Host" field in HTTP headers.</p>
            <p>translation tool: Israel has been removed from the Arabic countries list.</p>
            <p>heap-use-after-free.</p>
            <p>uncaught exceptions.</p>
            <p>memory overflowed.</p>
            <p>...</p>
            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>few</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.9 (uptime: 2022.03.27)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>The downloaded file is 1 byte when the HTTP header field "content-range" did not contain the "bytes" string</p>
            <p>HTTP request range limitations</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.8 (uptime: 2022.03.26)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Ignore this site -> browser extensions</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.4</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>The rename dialog is behind the confirm-dialog (windows only)</p>
            <p>Open directory did not work when save-path is the root directory (windows only)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.7 (uptime: 2022.03.25)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Add context menu on confirm-links dialog</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>Process filec.exe froze when HTTP response header no charset and "attachment;filename=" contains a non-utf8 string (windows only, caused by MinGW)</p>
            <p>Not able to change proxy on task-edit dialog</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.6 (uptime: 2022.03.25)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Sound effects when task download completed or error. (optional)</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.3</p>
            <p>Download all links from the web page</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>UI configs are lost when upgrading to a new version.</p>
            <p>On windows7, fileu std::filesystem::path error (caused by MinGW).</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.5 (uptime: 2022.03.22)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>File last modified time from HTTP server</p>
            <p>Show HTTP, Torrent confirming-dialog on top</p>
            <p>Task completed dialog</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>302 redirect on stream task</p>
            <p>Datetime format changed from GTM to ISO YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss</p>
            <p>fileu.exe is hidden when launched from Windows system service. (from browser extension after reboot)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.4 (uptime: 2022.03.20)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Add/Remove User agents.</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTP tasks lost 1 byte after during pause and restart the task. (critical)</p>
            <p>Some websites have HTTP range request limitations, auto-ban small range requests, cause download errors.</p>
            <p>History path</p>
            <p>Windows DPI</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.3 (uptime: 2022.03.18)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Users can change the software name during installation.</p>
            <p>Switch download manager from browser extension popup panel.</p>
            <p>Show confirm-dialog when tasks are sent from the web browser.</p>
            <p>Add new option "Without confirm" to HTTP settings</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTPS request fails when the port is not 443</p>
            <p>The translation tool inserted redundant backslashes into the string</p>
            <p>System service from settings is enabled when installing without system service</p>
            <p>Add 5 DHT bootstrap nodes</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.2 (uptime: 2022.03.16)</h3>

            <p>filec.exe fails to start when the desktop environment is non-English (windows only)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">

            <p>save window size</p>
            <p>auto add trackers to the new task (including downloads)</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>few</p>

            (uninstall before installing the new version)

                <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede">https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede</a>

<script>
    (function(){
        var list      = document.getElementById("codes").innerText.split('\n');
        var code_list = document.getElementById("code_list");
        var number    = 0;

        for(var i=0;i<list.length;++i)
        {
            var text = list[i].trim();

            if(text.length === 0){
                continue;
            }
            var item = document.createElement("div");

            if(number++ % 2 === 0){
                item.className = "code_time";
            }else{
                item.className = "code_text";
            }
            item.innerText = text;
            code_list.appendChild(item);
        }
    })();
</script>
<script src="../script/base.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};
        t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Dokumentasi</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <a href="documentation/how_to_install.html">Cara menginstal File Centipede</a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="documentation/how_to_uninstall.html">Cara menghapus instalasi File Centipede</a>
                </li>

                </li>

                </li>
                <li>

                </li>

                </li>

                </li>

                </li>

                </li>
                <!--
                <li>

                </li>

                <li>

        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Cara menginstal Ekstensi penjelajah</h1>
            <br/>Ekstensi penjelajah web ini dapat digunakan untuk menggantikan alat unduh default dari penjelajah. <br/><br/>Ekstensi ini dapat menangkap video dan audio dari halaman web, mendukung unduhan video aliran HTTP m3u8 dan penggabungan otomatis, mendukung dekripsi otomatis untuk sebagian besar video yang terenkripsi, dan mendukung pengambilan semua tautan magnet dari halaman web.<br/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_video_bar.png'/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_videos.png'/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_audios.png'/>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Cara menginstal Firefox Ekstensi penjelajah</h2>
            <div>
                <h4>Buka:</h4> about:addons
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Jatuhkan firefox.xpi File Menjadi
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons_drop.png'/>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons_add.png'/>
            </div>

        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Cara menginstal Chrome Ekstensi penjelajah</h2>
            <div>
                <h4>Buka:</h4> chrome://extensions/

                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_menu.png'/>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_menu2.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Aktifkan Mode pengembang
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_extension_dev_mode.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Jatuhkan chrome.crx File Menjadi
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_drop.png'/>

                <h3>Atau:</h3>
                Ekstrak chrome.zip
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_unzip.png'/>

                <br/><br/>Muat tanpa kemasan <b></b>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_load_unpacked.png'/>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Bagikan</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">

            <div class="items_">

</div>


    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Buat alamat</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h2>Javascript</h2>
            <p>Jika Anda menjalankan sebuah situs web.</p>
            <p>Sisipkan skrip ini ke dalam halaman web Anda, atau masukkan kode skrip ke dalam halaman web Anda, tetapi cara yang lebih baik adalah menempatkan skrip di situs web Anda, jika situs ini tidak online.</p>
            <div>
                <pre><xmp><script1 src="//filecxx.com/script/create_filec_address.js"></script1></xmp></pre>
            </div>
            <div>
                <a href="../../script/create_filec_address.js">Unduh skrip</a>
            </div>

            <div>
                <h3>Penggunaan:</h3>
                <p>
                    Lepaskan JSON ke dalam fungsi create_filec_address, lihat bidang json
                    <a href="#json_fields">JSON</a>
                </p>
                <pre><code>create_filec_address({uri:"http://...."});</code></pre>
            </div>

            <div>
                <h4>Sample:</h4>
                <a href="fileu:0eyJ1cmkiOiJodHRwczovL2dpdGh1Yi5jb20vZmlsZWN4eC9GaWxlQ2VudGlwZWRlL3Jhdy9tYWluL3JlbGVhc2UvY2hyb21lLmNyeCJ9">
                    fileu:0eyJ1cmkiOiJodHRwczovL2dpdGh1Yi5jb20vZmlsZWN4eC9GaWxlQ2VudGlwZWRlL3Jhdy9tYWluL3JlbGVhc2UvY2hyb21lLmNyeCJ9
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div style="margin-top: 24px">
                <p>
                    Jika Anda ingin menyembunyikan alamat asli Anda dari pengguna atau memberikan beberapa batasan untuk unduhan pengguna, Anda harus menggunakan alat \"buat alamat\" dari perangkat lunak, itu dapat menghasilkan alamat terenkripsi.
                </p>
                <p>
                    (Javascript tidak dapat membuat alamat terenkripsi.)
                </p>
            </div>
            <div>
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_create_address.png" alt="Buat alamat">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section json_keys" id="json_fields">
            <h2>JSON: Tambahkan tugas</h2>
            <div>
                Anda dapat menggunakan JSON sebagai alamat untuk menambahkan tugas, tetapi ingat, string JSON harus dalam satu baris.
                <br/>
                <br/>
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_add_json_task.png" alt="">
            </div>

            <table class="grid" style="margin-top: 12px">
                <thead>
                <tr>
                    <td>Kunci</td>
                    <td>Tipe</td>
                    <td style="width: 140px">Deskripsi</td>
                </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                <tr>
                    <td>uri</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Alamat</td>
                </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>

            <h4>HTTP / HTTPS / Stream Opsional</h4>
            <table class="grid" style="margin-top: 12px">
                <thead>
                <tr>
                    <td>Kunci</td>
                    <td>Tipe</td>
                    <td style="width: 140px">Deskripsi</td>
                </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                <tr>
                    <td>method</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>GET, POST ... You know the thing</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>catalog</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Katalog</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>page_url</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Tautan halaman</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>user_agent</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>User Agent</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>cookies</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Cookies</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>headers</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>HTTP Headers</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>content_type</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Content Type (for HTTP POST)</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>data</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>HTTP request data</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>connect_timeout</td>
                    <td>Nomor</td>
                    <td>Timeout koneksi</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>max_connections</td>
                    <td>Nomor</td>
                    <td>Maksimal koneksi</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>max_redirect</td>
                    <td>Nomor</td>
                    <td>Maksimal pengalihan</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>max_retry</td>
                    <td>Nomor</td>
                    <td>Maksimal percobaan ulang</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>file_name</td>
                    <td>String</td>
                    <td>Nama file</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>speed_limit_download</td>
                    <td>Nomor</td>
                    <td>Batas kecepatan unduh</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>auto_rename_file</td>
                    <td>bool</td>
                    <td>Ganti nama file secara otomatis</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>ignore_remote_modified</td>
                    <td>Nomor</td>
                    <td>Abaikan modifikasi jarak jauh</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>ignore_server_busy</td>
                    <td>Nomor</td>
                    <td>Abaikan server sibuk</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>ignore_http_error</td>
                    <td>Nomor</td>
                    <td>Abaikan kesalahan http</td>
                </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>

File: id_ID/documentation/how_to_convert_magnet_link_to_torrent_file.html
================
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>Cara mengonversi tautan magnet ke file torrent - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../style/base.css">
    <script type="text/javascript">

            <h1>Cara mengunduh file</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>1. Klik tombol tambah dari perangkat lunak.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/how_to_download_1.png"></p>

                <p>2. Masukkan atau tempel alamat URI file ke dalam EditBox.</p>
                <p>3. Klik tombol unduh sekarang.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_add_task.png"></p>

                <p>4. Atau, gunakan ekstensi penjelajah untuk mengunduh file melalui penjelajah web..</p>

                <p>
                    <a href="browser_integration.html">Cara menginstal Ekstensi penjelajah</a>

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../style/base.css">
    <script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){

    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script> 

</head>
<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">Beranda</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">Fitur</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">Unduh</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">Tangkapan layar</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">Ulasan pengguna</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">Dokumentasi</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">Indonesia</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Cara mendapatkan checksum file</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>
                    
File Centipede menyediakan alat checksum file yang terletak di menu perangkat lunak -> alat -> Checksum
                </p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_tool_checksum.png" alt="File Centipede Checksum">
                </p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_checksum_tool.png" alt="Alat checksum">
                </p>

            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Baris perintah</h3>
                <div>
                    <p>fileu --checksum Path</p>
                    <p>filec md5 Path</p>
                    <p>filec crc32 Path</p>
                    <p>filec sha1 Path</p>
                    <p>filec sha256 Path</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Bagikan</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

</body>

    <script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){

        t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");

<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">Beranda</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">Fitur</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">Unduh</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">Tangkapan layar</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">Ulasan pengguna</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">Dokumentasi</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">Indonesia</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Cara meningkatkan kecepatan unduh</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
Untuk tugas HTTP, pengaturan paralel default adalah halus, tetapi Anda dapat mengubahnya menjadi tercepat, yang dapat meningkatkan kecepatan unduh Anda dan menghemat waktu Anda sekitar 1-30 detik.</p>
                <p>
Namun, mengubahnya menjadi tercepat dapat menyebabkan alamat IP Anda diblokir oleh server jarak jauh. (probabilitas rendah)</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_settings_http.png" alt="File Centipede HTTP setting"></p>
                <p>
Untuk tugas Torrent, Anda dapat menambahkan tracker untuk meningkatkan kecepatan unduh & unggah Anda.
Tetapi syaratnya adalah peer lain menggunakan tracker yang sama dan mengunduh atau mengunggah file yang sama.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_software_task_add_tracker.png" width="800" alt="File Centipede Torrent tracker"></p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Bagikan</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

<script src="../../script/base.js"></script>

</body>
</html>

            </div>

</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Cara menginstal File Centipede</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>1. Ekstrak file zip yang diunduh.</p>
                <p>2. Klik file dari direktori.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/fileu_exe.png"></p>
                <p>3. Klik tombol instal.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_install.png" alt="Cara menginstal File Centipede"></p>
                <p>4. Instalasi selesai.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Baris perintah</h3>
                <p>
                    filec -i system_service
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Bagikan</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede menyediakan alat penggabungan file yang terletak di menu perangkat lunak -> alat -> Penggabungan File</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_tool_file_merge.png" alt="File Centipede file merge"></p>
                <p><img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_file_merge.png" alt="File Centipede file merge"></p>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Cara menghapus instalasi File Centipede</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>1. Klik bantuan dari menu perangkat lunak.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help.png"></p>
                <p>2. Klik item Hapus Instal.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_uninstall.png"></p>
                <p>3. Klik tombol Hapus Instal.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_uninstall_btn.png"></p>
                <p>4. Hapus direktori perangkat lunak.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Baris perintah</h3>
                <p>
                    filec -u
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

                <h4>Linux x64 (No glibc dependency)</h4>

                <a class="button" href="https://sourceforge.net/projects/filecentipede/files/">Tautan unduh3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

            <h1>Manajer file FTP</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede juga merupakan manajer file FTP, dapat mengunduh & mengunggah file dari server FTP, termasuk direktori atau seluruh situs FTP.</p>
                <p>
Sangat mudah digunakan, Anda tidak perlu memasukkan banyak pengaturan, Anda hanya perlu memasukkan alamat host ke dalam bilah alamat.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_ftp.png" width="800" alt="FTP file manager">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
Untuk memaksimalkan kecepatan daftar file direktori,
File Centipede dapat menyimpan cache semua file direktori yang telah Anda kunjungi, sehingga saat Anda membuka direktori yang sama berikutnya akan terasa seperti membuka direktori lokal.</p>
            </div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Manajer unduh jarak jauh</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>File Centipede menyediakan antarmuka pengguna asli untuk mengunduh file jarak jauh.</p>
                <p>Ini terletak di menu utama yang disebut <b>jarak jauh</b>.</p>
                <p>Sangat sederhana untuk digunakan. Anda hanya perlu memasukkan alamat IP/domain host jarak jauh, lalu klik host dari item menu yang baru saja Anda tambahkan.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_remote_add.png" alt="add remote host">
                </p>
                <p>Jika Anda ingin komputer Anda dapat terhubung, Anda perlu membuka Pengaturan -> Layanan, dan aktifkan <b>Akses jarak jauh</b> ke <b>aktif</b>. Dan jangan lupa untuk mengatur kata sandi.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_settings_enable_remote_access.png" alt="enable remote access">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>Baris perintah</h3>
                <p>filec remote_access on</p>
                <p>filec service_port 10111</p>
                <p>filec service_password your_password</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Unduh</a>
        </div>

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>Pengunduh video - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../style/base.css">
    <script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};
        t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");

</head>
<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">Beranda</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">Fitur</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">Unduh</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">Tangkapan layar</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">Ulasan pengguna</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">Dokumentasi</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">Indonesia</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Pengunduh video</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede dapat mengunduh video dari lebih dari 99% situs web.</p>
                <p>
Ini bahkan dapat menganalisis alamat video dari Javascript, dan mengekstrak kunci video yang terdekripsi dari penutupan Javascript.
Untuk beberapa situs web khusus, hanya File Centipede yang dapat mengunduh videonya.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
Ini menyediakan dua cara mudah untuk mengunduh video atau audio dari halaman web.
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
1: Unduh dari bilah mengambang di samping video.</p>
            </div>

            <div>
                <img src="../../images/extension_video_bar.png" alt="download web video">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <p class="article_">
2: Unduh dari jendela pop-up.</p>
            <div>
                <img src="../../images/extension_videos.png" alt="download web videos from popup">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../documentation/browser_integration.html" class="article_">Cara menginstal Ekstensi penjelajah</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Unduh</a>
        </div>

            </div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Manajer file WebDAV</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede juga merupakan manajer file WebDAV. Ia dapat mengunduh & mengunggah file dari server WebDAV, termasuk direktori atau seluruh situs WebDAV.</p>
                <p>
Sangat mudah digunakan, Anda tidak perlu memasukkan banyak pengaturan, Anda hanya perlu memasukkan alamat host ke dalam bilah alamat.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_webdav.png" width="800" alt="WebDAV file manager">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
Untuk memaksimalkan kecepatan daftar file direktori,
File Centipede dapat menyimpan cache semua file direktori yang telah Anda kunjungi, sehingga saat Anda membuka direktori yang sama berikutnya akan terasa seperti membuka direktori lokal.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Unduh</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>Bagikan</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>

        <div class="section description" id="description">
            <h2>Deskripsi</h2>
            <div id="description_text">File Centipede adalah manajer unggah/unduh file internet All-In-One, Klien BitTorrent, klien WebDAV, klien FTP, dan klien SSH. Dirancang untuk cepat, dapat disesuaikan, dan ramah pengguna. Mendukung multi-protokol dan berisi banyak alat bantu berguna seperti permintaan HTTP, penggabungan file, dan pengkode. Dengan integrasi penjelajah, Anda dapat mengunduh audio dan video dari situs web, bahkan video terenkripsi.</div>
        </div>

            <a class="label_ blue_" href="os/linux_download_manager.html">Manajer unduh Linux</a>

            <a class="label_ blue_" href="features/remote_download_manager.html">Manajer unduh jarak jauh</a>
        </div>
