        <div class="section" id="user_reviews">
            <h2>Ulasan pengguna</h2>

            <div class="user_review">
                <div class="title_">
                    <h4>File Centipede - A download tool with more features than you can handle</h4>
                </div>
                <div class="desc_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://www.wfdownloader.xyz/blog/file-centipede-a-download-tool-with-more-features-than-you-can-handle">
                        Recently, I found a download manager that caught my attention and is worth talking about. It's called File Centipede.
                        It's more than just a download manager. It has so many features that even power users like me found it impressive.
                        What's more, it's free, open-source, clean, cross-platform
                        ...
                    </a>
                </div>
                <div class="name_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://www.wfdownloader.xyz/">WFDownloader</a>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="user_review">
                <div class="title_">
                    <h4>This Internet file download manager comes equipped with enhanced features and offers support for a wide range of download sources</h4>
                </div>
                <div class="desc_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://www.softpedia.com/get/Internet/Download-Managers/File-Centipede.shtmle">
                        Right from the start, we noticed the logical and well-thought design of the layout, which relies on a series of panels and tabs for providing the available tools and various information. One can, at a single glance preview downloading content
                        ...
                    </a>
                </div>
                <div class="name_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://www.softpedia.com">softpedia</a>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="user_review">
                <div class="title_">
                    <h4>HTTP、FTP、magnet、torrent、m3u8 などのプロトコルに対応しているダウンロードマネージャ</h4>
                </div>
                <div class="desc_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://softaro.net/file-centipede/">
                        File Centipede は、HTTP / HTTPS、FTP / FTPS、magnet や torrent、m3u8 などのプロトコルに対応している、使いやすくカスタマイズが可能なダウンロードマネージャです。

                        便利な機能が多数含まれており、広告なしで無料で、オーディオやビデオのダウンロードにも使用できます。このダウンロードマネージャを使用すると、 Web サイトからのダウンロード速度を向上できます
                        ...
                    </a>
                </div>
                <div class="name_">
                    <a target="_blank" href="https://softaro.net/">softaro</a>
                </div>
            </div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Manajer unduh Linux</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
<p>File Centipede adalah manajer unduh Linux terbaik.</p>
<p>Ini adalah satu-satunya yang mendukung semua protokol utama dan manajer unduh video sniffer untuk Linux.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_add_task.png" alt="file centipede add task">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
Ini juga berisi banyak alat bantu seperti penggabungan file, checksum, pengkode base64, pengkode URI, dan magnet-ke-torrent......
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_file_merge.png" alt="file merge">
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_checksum_tool.png" alt="file checksum">
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_magnet2torrent.png" alt="magnet to torrent">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
Anda juga dapat menggunakannya untuk mengelola file jarak jauh seperti WebDAV, FTP, dan SSH.
            </div>
            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_webdav.png" alt="file centipede remote file manager" width="800">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
Sangat mudah untuk menginstalnya, hanya perlu satu klik, dan tidak memerlukan pustaka dinamis lainnya, bahkan Glibc.
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">Unduh</a>
        </div>

    <h2>Bagikan</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

                <p>Nasihat & Saran.</p>
                <p>Tukar kode aktivasi.</p>
                <p>Dukungan kustomisasi perangkat lunak.</p>
                <p>Dukungan pribadi.</p>
                <p>...</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

<script>
    load_sponsors = function(list)
    {
        if(!(list instanceof Array)){
            return;
        }
        var tbody = document.getElementById("sponsors_tbody");

        for(var i=0;i<list.length;++i)
        {
            var row     = list[i];
            var tr      = document.createElement("tr");
            var name    = document.createElement("td");
            var logo    = document.createElement("td");
            var text    = document.createElement("td");
            var balance = document.createElement("td");

            logo.innerHTML    = "<img src='http://w.filecxx.com/tpl/"+row.logo+"' style='max-height: 150px;max-width: 250px'>";
            text.innerText    = row.text;
            name.innerText    = row.name;
            balance.innerHTML = row.balance;

            tr.appendChild(logo);
            tr.appendChild(text);
            tr.appendChild(name);
            tr.appendChild(balance);

            tbody.appendChild(tr);
        }
    }
</script>
<script src="https://w.filecxx.com/action.php?act=sponsors&callback=load_sponsors"></script>
<script src="../script/base.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};
        t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script> 

</body>
</html>

File: id_ID/update_log.html

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">

    <title>Log pembaruan - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../style/base.css">
    <style>
        li{
            font-size: 16px;
            padding: 4px 8px 4px 8px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="index.html#">Beranda</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="index.html#features">Fitur</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="download.html">Unduh</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="screenshot.html">Tangkapan layar</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="index.html#user_reviews">Ulasan pengguna</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="documentation.html">Dokumentasi</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">Indonesia</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>


    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Log pembaruan</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.82 (uptime: 2023.02.06)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Fully shutdown.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>When the remote HTTP server sends error data without disconnecting, causing this segment of data not to be downloaded and the final file size to not match the remote one, this scenario is likely to occur when the remote connection is unstable or frequently switches proxy IPs.</p>
            <p>When downloading a file from the file browser, the file save path follows the catalog instead of the user choosing one.</p>
            <p>The browser extension gets the wrong cookies from the incognito window.</p>

            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>Change the default parallel option to "Fastest".</p>
            <p>FileCXX private DHT network module (libdybn) has been removed, using BitTorrent public DHT network as the alternate.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.81 (uptime: 2023.1.6)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Language: Tiếng Việt</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTP task infinite redirect when reading partial content gets 301 code.</p>
            <p>When downloading a large number of small files, repeatedly stopping or deleting tasks may cause errors in tasks that are waiting in the queue, indirectly causing filec to crash.</p>
            <p>When the taskbar tray icon is clicked, the window does not become the top window.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.8 stable (uptime: 2022.12.31)</h3>
            <p>
                This is the last version of FileCentipede2. The development of the next major version 3.0 has started.<br/><br/>
                If you have any feature requests, please post them on
                <a href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/discussions/402">https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/discussions/402</a>
            </p>

            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.8</p>
            <p>Language file "ru_RU.lang" updated.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>URL directory parse error, such as "http://localhost/a=1&b=/dir/file".</p>
            <p>The FTP task becomes stuck in the stopping state if the connection fails.</p>
            <p>Unable to receive FTP file list when remote FTP server sends code 226 before sending the file list.</p>
            <p>The browser extension shows "Send failed" when getting an URL that starts with "blob:".</p>
            <p>The browser extension sometimes fails to obtain the cookie information for a URL.</p>
            <p>A new strategy for downloading protected m3u8 segments.</p>
            <p>In some cases, the downloaded file is m3u8 content instead of a video.</p>
            <p>m3u8 png segments.</p>
            <p>m3u8 parsing segment URL lost the last character when the m3u8 file did not end with a newline.</p>
            <p>Use "filename*=UTF-8" as the preferred filename instead of "filename=".</p>
            <p>The "Blocks" from the detail panel are displayed reversely when the HTTP task is not resumable.</p>
            <p>Unlocked variables caused the filec process to crash.</p>
            <p>The settings from the 'Update-dialog' cannot be saved.</p>
            <p>Display an error message when the remote client fails to connect.</p>
            <p>Increase the SSH maximum connect timeout to 120 seconds, rather than the current 12 seconds.</p>
            <p>filec crashes if the remote HTTP response headers include both 'content-range' and 'transfer-encoding' at the same time.</p>
            <p>When downloading multiple files with the same file name but different contents simultaneously, the automatic renaming function may potentially cause errors in writing to the files due to a lack of locking, indirectly causing filec to crash.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.7 (uptime: 2022.08.29)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>URI generator (from URI tool)</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>thread deadlock</p>
            <p>unable to download files when HTTP server response conflicted headers: Accept-Ranges, Content-Range, Content-Encoding</p>
            <p>unable to download files when HTTP server response transfer_encoding is chunked with 0-byte data</p>
            <p>magnet-task causing filec crashes during multiple times of adding and canceling.</p>
            <p>ESC key on dialog</p>
            <p>duplicate shortcut key</p>
            <p>fileu dialog crashes</p>
            <p>fileu status bar DHT number was inaccurate.</p>
            <p>remote client crashes on windows 7</p>
            <p>torrent-task directory icon missed after restarting filec</p>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.6 & 2.61 (uptime: 2022.08.21)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Remote download manager (NativeUI, not WebUI)</p>
            <p>File browser: copy file URL, path</p>
            <p>Command line: service_port, service_password, remote_access</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.7</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>(2.61) downgrade wolfssl to 5.4.0 </p>
            <p>Cannot save options from the software's update dialog.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when deleting an SSH or FTP directory and then canceling it.</p>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.5 (uptime: 2022.08.13)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Save column width.</p>
            <p>Save window position. (default: off)</p>
            <p>Force restart</p>
            <p>Add trackers from the subscribed list.</p>
            <p>Command line: create_torrent</p>
            <p>Language: português</p>
            <p>Translation tool: select languages directory</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>When remote HTTP server received range: bytes=0-0, but continue response more data, causing task progress over 100%.</p>
            <p>Max Connect timeout up to 120s instead of 12s</p>
            <p>File name incomplete when remote HTTP server response header field content-disposition contains multiple "=?UTF8?B?" sections.</p>
            <p>Auto upgrade software.</p>
        </div>


        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.4 (uptime: 2022.08.02)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Tray icon event for windows.</p>
            <p>Set all new tasks save-path from the Add-task-dialog.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>After pausing and resuming an HTTP task, the task progress reset to 0.</p>
            <p>Auto-created host's default config error when entering address from the file browser's address bar.</p>
            <p>File browser extracts username and password from URL.</p>
            <p>Remove the default path "/" from the file browser.</p>
            <p>Remove the checkbox from torrent confirm-dialog when the torrent only has one file.</p>
            <p>Torrent confirm-dialog file size missing when the torrent only has one file.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.3 (uptime: 2022.08.01)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Browser extension up to 1.5, massively optimized, it can extract videos from javascript.</p>
            <p>File checksum tool (text, file, directory).</p>
            <p>File size filter for torrent-task.</p>
            <p>Taskbar progress for windows</p>
            <p>Alert setting: delete task</p>
            <p>Alert setting: delete catalog</p>
            <p>Stream-task settings: Base URL, Key, IV</p>
            <p>Merge tool: video+audio merge (FFmpeg required)</p>
            <p>Language Français</p>
            <p>Language Nederlands</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>announce_to_all_tiers and announce_to_all_trackers set as default.</p>
            <p>HTTPS trackers (Linux)</p>
            <p>filec crashes when HTTP cookies over 4 KB.</p>
            <p>Convert URI space to "%20" instead of "+"</p>
            <p>m3u8 merge files error on windows7</p>
            <p>uploaded directories displayed as regular files from the file browser.</p>
            <p>SSH connections timed out but the state was still connected.</p>
            <p>SSH file manager "operation failed" error.</p>
            <p>When resuming an HTTP task and the URL address was expired causing an incomplete file to be downloaded. (New bug since 2.0)</p>
            <p>Torrent-task inaccurate statistics.</p>
            <p>Torrent-task rename from confirm-dialog failed.</p>
            <p>m3u8 parse error.</p>
            <p>Clipboard multiple triggers.</p>
            <p>HTTP-task filename with =?UTF-8?B?</p>
            <p>fileu incomplete task list (fully fixed).</p>
            <p>fileu directory icon.</p>
            <p>fileu window randomly activated.</p>
            <p>DHT 0</p>
            <p>...</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.21 (uptime: 2022.07.02)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>stream-task 401, 403 error.</p>
            <p>stream-task HTTP 302 redirect causing filec crashes.</p>
            <p>stream-task merge file error after pausing and resuming the task.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.2 (uptime: 2022.06.30)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>torrent port setting</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>"CheckBox" for torrent-task subdirectories</p>
            <p>torrent-task state display as completed but still seeding.</p>
            <p>torrent-task lost the resume-data in some cases.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.1 (uptime: 2022.06.29)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>site rules</p>
            <p>language zh_TW</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>WebDAV default config error for file downloading.</p>
            <p>torrent-task is not able to stop when checking files.</p>
            <p>when the HTTP server response code is 401 or 403, remove the "Referer" and "Origin" fields from HTTP headers before resending the HTTP request.</p>
            <p>some web servers accepted HTTP range requests but the response code is 200 with 0-byte content, instead of 201, causing a 0-byte file to be downloaded. (wingftp)</p>
            <p>torrent-task files rename failed after multiple tries.</p>
            <p>FTP server 504 error (CLNT, OPTS UTF8 ON).</p>
            <p>DateTime 0.000000.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.02 (uptime: 2022.06.25)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>redundant path separator</p>
            <p>XML tag case-sensitive caused the WebDAV list directory to fail.</p>
            <p>file has not been removed from the file browser list when the remote directory path is  /</p>
            <p>when uploading/downloading a directory max connections have been reduced when the directory contains a small file.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.0/2.01 (uptime: 2022.06.24)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>opening a task file show an alert when the file has been deleted or moved.</p>
            <p>context-menu for torrent confirm-dialog</p>
            <p>supported command line: curl, wget, aria2, axel</p>
            <p>option: silent mode</p>
            <p>detail panel: blocks</p>
            <p>detail panel: connections</p>
            <p>protocol: SSH(sftp)</p>
            <p>option: proxy modes (Always, If_Available, Round_Robin, Round_Robin_Connections)</p>
            <p>option: no task record</p>
            <p>option: parallel (smooth, fastest)</p>
            <p>settings: stream task</p>
            <p>settings: SSH</p>
            <p>settings: File Browser</p>
            <p>download directory & upload directory</p>
            <p>file browser, network file manager for WebDAV, WebDAVS, FTP, FTPS, SSH(SFTP)</p>
            <p>...</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>filec fails to start when the database file is broken.</p>
            <p>global-speed-limit settings for stream tasks.</p>
            <p>file icon association error on windows.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when the service receives an empty request.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when the local network is unavailable.</p>
            <p>ftp compatibility for non-standard server.</p>
            <p>HTTP cookie containing a "secure" field case endless loop.</p>
            <p>when add-task dialog switching the URL config causing fields are missed.</p>
            <p>stream-task missing completed dialog.</p>
            <p>tasks-detail update data is in slow motion.</p>
            <p>tray icon show/hide fails in some case.</p>
            <p>http-task state frozen when the response body is empty.</p>
            <p>torrent-confirm dialog information error.</p>
            <p>an invalid file is downloaded when the HTTP response code is 206 and the keep-alive is false.</p>
            <p>incomplete encoded URI path.</p>
            <p>encode URI path before sending the HTTP header.</p>
            <p>stream-task HTTP response code 474 marked as server busy.</p>
            <p>copy address from task error (std::string_view out of scope).</p>
            <p>an empty file was downloaded when the HTTP response headers contained content-encoding and content-range.</p>
            <p>"Host" field in HTTP headers.</p>
            <p>translation tool: Israel has been removed from the Arabic countries list.</p>
            <p>heap-use-after-free.</p>
            <p>uncaught exceptions.</p>
            <p>memory overflowed.</p>
            <p>...</p>
            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>few</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.9 (uptime: 2022.03.27)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>The downloaded file is 1 byte when the HTTP header field "content-range" did not contain the "bytes" string</p>
            <p>HTTP request range limitations</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.8 (uptime: 2022.03.26)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Ignore this site -> browser extensions</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.4</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>The rename dialog is behind the confirm-dialog (windows only)</p>
            <p>Open directory did not work when save-path is the root directory (windows only)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.7 (uptime: 2022.03.25)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Add context menu on confirm-links dialog</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>Process filec.exe froze when HTTP response header no charset and "attachment;filename=" contains a non-utf8 string (windows only, caused by MinGW)</p>
            <p>Not able to change proxy on task-edit dialog</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.6 (uptime: 2022.03.25)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Sound effects when task download completed or error. (optional)</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.3</p>
            <p>Download all links from the web page</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>UI configs are lost when upgrading to a new version.</p>
            <p>On windows7, fileu std::filesystem::path error (caused by MinGW).</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.5 (uptime: 2022.03.22)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>File last modified time from HTTP server</p>
            <p>Show HTTP, Torrent confirming-dialog on top</p>
            <p>Task completed dialog</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>302 redirect on stream task</p>
            <p>Datetime format changed from GTM to ISO YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss</p>
            <p>fileu.exe is hidden when launched from Windows system service. (from browser extension after reboot)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.4 (uptime: 2022.03.20)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Add/Remove User agents.</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTP tasks lost 1 byte after during pause and restart the task. (critical)</p>
            <p>Some websites have HTTP range request limitations, auto-ban small range requests, cause download errors.</p>
            <p>History path</p>
            <p>Windows DPI</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.3 (uptime: 2022.03.18)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Users can change the software name during installation.</p>
            <p>Switch download manager from browser extension popup panel.</p>
            <p>Show confirm-dialog when tasks are sent from the web browser.</p>
            <p>Add new option "Without confirm" to HTTP settings</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTPS request fails when the port is not 443</p>
            <p>The translation tool inserted redundant backslashes into the string</p>
            <p>System service from settings is enabled when installing without system service</p>
            <p>Add 5 DHT bootstrap nodes</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.2 (uptime: 2022.03.16)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>filec.exe fails to start when the desktop environment is non-English (windows only)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.1 (uptime: 2022.03.15)</h3>

            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>save window size</p>
            <p>auto add trackers to the new task (including downloads)</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>few</p>

            (uninstall before installing the new version)
        </div>
    </div>

File: index.html

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <meta http-equiv="refresh" content="1; url=en_US/index.html" />
    <title>File Centipede</title>
    <script>
    (function(){
        var list = ["en_US","zh_CN","zh_TW","ru_RU","ko_KR","de_DE","id_ID","tr_TR"];
        var lang = navigator.language.replace('-','_');
        var name = "en_US";

        for(let i=0;i<list.length;++i) {
            if(list[i] === lang){
                name = list[i];
                break;
            }
        }
        window.location = name + "/index.html";
    })();
</script>
</head>
<body>

<h1>File Centipede</h1>
<div>
    <a href="en_US/index.html"><h2>English</h2></a>
    <a href="zh_CN/index.html"><h2>简体中文</h2></a>
    <a href="zh_TW/index.html"><h2>繁體中文</h2></a>
    <a href="ru_RU/index.html"><h2>Русский</h2></a>
    <a href="ko_KR/index.html"><h2>한국어</h2></a>
    <a href="de_DE/index.html"><h2>Deutsch</h2></a>
    <a href="id_ID/index.html"><h2>Indonesia</h2></a>
    <a href="tr_TR/index.html"><h2>Turkish</h2></a>

</html>

        <div class="section">
            <h1>활성화 코드</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h4>프리미엄 에디션은 GitHub 저장소 별이 10만 명에 도달하면 무료 에디션이 됩니다.</h4>
            <div>
                <span style="font-weight: bold">Github:</span>
                <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede">https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede</a>
            </div>
            <div class="tips_">
                <p>
                    이 프로젝트의 기여자인 경우 평생 정품 인증 코드를 받을 수 있습니다.
                </p>
                <p>
                    이 프로젝트에 기여할 수 없는 경우 대시보드에서 장기 및 평생 활성화 코드를 교환할 수 있습니다.
                </p>
                <p>
                    <b>대시보드: </b>
                    <a href="https://w.filecxx.com" target="_blank">https://w.filecxx.com</a>
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

<script>
    (function(){
        var list      = document.getElementById("codes").innerText.split('\n');
        var code_list = document.getElementById("code_list");
        var number    = 0;

        for(var i=0;i<list.length;++i)
        {
            var text = list[i].trim();

            if(text.length === 0){
                continue;
            }
            var item = document.createElement("div");

            if(number++ % 2 === 0){
                item.className = "code_time";
            }else{
                item.className = "code_text";
            }
            item.innerText = text;
            code_list.appendChild(item);
        }
    })();
</script>
<script src="../script/base.js"></script>

        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};

        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");

            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>설치 방법 브라우저 확장</h1>
            <br/>이 웹 브라우저 확장을 사용하여 브라우저의 기본 다운로드 도구를 대체할 수 있습니다. <br/><br/>확장 기능은 웹 페이지에서 비디오와 오디오를 캡처할 수 있으며, m3u8 HTTP 스트림 비디오 다운로드 및 자동 병합을 지원하며, 대부분의 암호화 비디오 자동 암호 해독을 지원하며 웹 페이지에서 모든 마그넷 링크를 가져올 수 있습니다.<br/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_video_bar.png'/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_videos.png'/>
            <br/><br/><img src='../../images/extension_audios.png'/>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h2>설치 방법 Firefox 브라우저 확장</h2>
            <div>
                <h4>열기:</h4> about:addons
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons.png'/>

                <br/><br/>떨구기 firefox.xpi 파일 에서
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons_drop.png'/>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/firefox_addons_add.png'/>
            </div>

        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h2>설치 방법 Chrome 브라우저 확장</h2>
            <div>
                <h4>열기:</h4> chrome://extensions/

                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_menu.png'/>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_menu2.png'/>

                <br/><br/>사용함 개발자 모드
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_extension_dev_mode.png'/>

                <br/><br/>떨구기 chrome.crx 파일 에서
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_drop.png'/>

                <h3>또는:</h3>
                Unzip chrome.zip
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_unzip.png'/>

                <br/><br/>압축 풀고 불러오기 <b></b>
                <br/><br/><img src='../../images/browser/chrome_load_unpacked.png'/>
            </div>
        </div>

    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">홈</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">기능</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">다운로드</a>

        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">사용자 리뷰</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">문서</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">한국어</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>


    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>주소 만들기</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h2>Javascript</h2>
            <p>웹 사이트를 실행하는 경우입니다.</p>
            <p>웹 페이지에 이 스크립트를 삽입하거나 웹 페이지에 스크립트 코드를 삽입합니다. 그러나 이 웹 사이트가 온라인 상태가 아닌 경우 웹 사이트에 스크립트를 넣는 것이 더 좋은 방법입니다.</p>
            <div>
                <pre><xmp><script1 src="//filecxx.com/script/create_filec_address.js"></script1></xmp></pre>
            </div>
            <div>
                <a href="../../script/create_filec_address.js">스크립트 다운로드</a>
            </div>

            <div>
                <h3>사용법:</h3>
                <p>
                    JSON을 create_filec_address 함수에 전달합니다. json 필드 참조
                    <a href="#json_fields">JSON</a>
                </p>
                <pre><code>create_filec_address({uri:"http://...."});</code></pre>
            </div>

            <div>
                <h4>Sample:</h4>
                <a href="fileu:0eyJ1cmkiOiJodHRwczovL2dpdGh1Yi5jb20vZmlsZWN4eC9GaWxlQ2VudGlwZWRlL3Jhdy9tYWluL3JlbGVhc2UvY2hyb21lLmNyeCJ9">
                    fileu:0eyJ1cmkiOiJodHRwczovL2dpdGh1Yi5jb20vZmlsZWN4eC9GaWxlQ2VudGlwZWRlL3Jhdy9tYWluL3JlbGVhc2UvY2hyb21lLmNyeCJ9
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div style="margin-top: 24px">
                <p>
                    사용자로부터 실제 주소를 숨기거나 사용자 다운로드에 대한 제한 사항을 제공하려면 소프트웨어에서 \"주소 만들기\" 도구를 사용해야 합니다. 그러면 암호화된 주소를 생성할 수 있습니다.
                </p>
                <p>
                    (Javascript에서 암호화된 주소를 만들 수 없습니다.)
                </p>
            </div>
            <div>
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_create_address.png" alt="주소 만들기">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section json_keys" id="json_fields">
            <h2>JSON: 작업 추가</h2>
            <div>
                JSON을 주소로 사용하여 작업을 추가할 수 있지만 JSON 문자열은 한 줄에 있어야 합니다.
                <br/>
                <br/>
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_add_json_task.png" alt="">
            </div>

            <table class="grid" style="margin-top: 12px">
                <thead>
                <tr>
                    <td>키</td>
                    <td>유형</td>
                    <td style="width: 140px">설명</td>
                </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                <tr>
                    <td>uri</td>
                    <td>문자열</td>
                    <td>주소</td>
                </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>

            <h4>HTTP / HTTPS / Stream 선택 사항</h4>
            <table class="grid" style="margin-top: 12px">
                <thead>
                <tr>
                    <td>키</td>
                    <td>유형</td>
                    <td style="width: 140px">설명</td>
                </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                <tr>
                    <td>method</td>
                    <td>문자열</td>
                    <td>GET, POST ... You know the thing</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>catalog</td>
                    <td>문자열</td>
                    <td>카탈로그</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>page_url</td>
                    <td>문자열</td>
                    <td>페이지 url</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>user_agent</td>
                    <td>문자열</td>
                    <td>User Agent</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>cookies</td>
                    <td>문자열</td>
                    <td>Cookies</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>headers</td>
                    <td>문자열</td>
                    <td>HTTP Headers</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>content_type</td>
                    <td>문자열</td>
                    <td>Content Type (for HTTP POST)</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>data</td>
                    <td>문자열</td>
                    <td>HTTP request data</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>connect_timeout</td>
                    <td>번호</td>
                    <td>연결 시간 초과</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>max_connections</td>
                    <td>번호</td>
                    <td>최대 연결</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>max_redirect</td>
                    <td>번호</td>
                    <td>최대 리디렉션</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>max_retry</td>
                    <td>번호</td>
                    <td>최대 재시도</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>file_name</td>

                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>auto_rename_file</td>

                    <td>파일 이름 자동 변경</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>ignore_remote_modified</td>
                    <td>번호</td>
                    <td>수정된 원격 무시</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>ignore_server_busy</td>
                    <td>번호</td>
                    <td>서버 사용 중 무시</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>ignore_http_error</td>
                    <td>번호</td>
                    <td>http 오류 무시</td>
                </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>

File: ko_KR/documentation/how_to_convert_magnet_link_to_torrent_file.html
================
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">

        <div class="section">
            <h1>자석 링크를 토렌트 파일로 변환하는 방법</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>1. 
소프트웨어 메뉴 -> 도구 -> 자석을 토렌트에서 자석을 토렌트 항목을 클릭합니다.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_tool_magnet2torrent.png"></p>
                <p><img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_magnet2torrent.png"></p>

            </div>

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>토렌트 만들기 방법</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>1. 
소프트웨어 메뉴 -> 도구 -> 토렌트 만들기에서 토렌트 만들기 항목을 클릭합니다..</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_tool_create_torrent.png"></p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_create_torrent.png" alt="토렌트 만들기"></p>

                <p>2. 
파일 또는 디렉토리를 선택합니다..</p>
                <p>3. 
토렌트 만들기 버튼을 클릭하고 만든 토렌트 파일을 저장합니다..</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>공유</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>

        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">한국어</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>파일 다운로드 방법</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>1. 소프트웨어에서 추가 버튼을 클릭합니다..</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/how_to_download_1.png"></p>

                <p>2. 파일 URI 주소를 편집 상자에 입력하거나 붙여넣습니다..</p>
                <p>3. 지금 다운로드 버튼을 클릭합니다..</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_add_task.png"></p>

                <p>4. 또는 브라우저 확장을 사용하여 웹 브라우저를 통해 파일을 다운로드합니다..</p>

                <p>
                    <a href="browser_integration.html">설치 방법 브라우저 확장</a>
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>공유</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

            <h1>파일 체크섬을 가져오는 방법</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>
                    
File Centipede는 소프트웨어 메뉴 -> 도구 -> 체크섬에 위치한 파일 체크섬 도구를 제공합니다
                </p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_help_tool_checksum.png" alt="File Centipede Checksum">
                </p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_checksum_tool.png" alt="체크섬 도구">
                </p>

            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>명령 행</h3>
                <div>
                    <p>fileu --checksum Path</p>
                    <p>filec md5 Path</p>
                    <p>filec crc32 Path</p>
                    <p>filec sha1 Path</p>
                    <p>filec sha256 Path</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>공유</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>다운로드 속도를 높이는 방법 - File Centipede</title>

    <link rel="icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />

    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">홈</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">기능</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">다운로드</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">스크린샷</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">사용자 리뷰</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">문서</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">한국어</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>다운로드 속도를 높이는 방법</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
HTTP 작업의 경우 기본 병렬 설정은 매끄러운이지만 가장 빠른으로 변경할 수 있으므로 다운로드 속도를 높이고 시간을 1~30초 정도 절약할 수 있습니다.</p>
                <p>
그러나 가장 빠른으로 변경하면 원격 서버에 의해 IP 주소가 차단될 수 있습니다. (낮은 확률)</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_settings_http.png" alt="File Centipede HTTP setting"></p>
                <p>
토렌트 작업의 경우 트래커를 추가하여 다운로드 및 업로드 속도를 높일 수 있습니다.
그러나 다른 피어가 동일한 트래커를 사용하여 동일한 파일을 다운로드하거나 업로드하는 경우입니다.</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/screenshot_software_task_add_tracker.png" width="800" alt="File Centipede Torrent tracker"></p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>공유</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

<script src="../../script/base.js"></script>

</body>
</html>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>GUI</h3>
                <p>1. 다운로드한 zip 파일의 압축을 풉니다..</p>
                <p>2. 디렉터리에서 fileu를 클릭합니다..</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/fileu_exe.png"></p>
                <p>3. 설치 버튼을 클릭합니다..</p>
                <p><img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_install.png" alt="설치 방법 File Centipede"></p>
                <p>4. 설치가 완료되었습니다..</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <h3>명령 행</h3>
                <p>
                    filec -i system_service
                </p>

        <div class="detail_">

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>FTP 파일 관리자</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede는 FTP 파일 관리자이기도 하며 디렉터리 또는 전체 FTP 사이트를 포함하여 FTP 서버에서 파일을 다운로드하고 업로드할 수 있습니다.</p>
                <p>
이 기능은 매우 사용하기 쉽고, 많은 설정을 입력할 필요가 없으며, 주소 표시줄에 호스트 주소를 입력하기만 하면 됩니다.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_ftp.png" width="800" alt="FTP file manager">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
디렉터리 파일 나열 속도를 최대화하려면 다음과 같이 하십시오.
File Centipede는 방문한 모든 디렉터리 파일을 캐시할 수 있으며, 다음에 나열할 때 동일한 디렉터리가 로컬 디렉터리를 여는 것과 같습니다.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">다운로드</a>
        </div>

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>원격 다운로드 관리자 - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />

    <script type="text/javascript">

    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">홈</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">기능</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">다운로드</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">스크린샷</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">사용자 리뷰</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">문서</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">한국어</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>원격 다운로드 관리자</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>File centipede는 원격 파일 다운로드를 위한 기본 사용자 인터페이스를 제공했습니다.</p>
                <p>그것은 <b>원격</b>이라는 기본 메뉴에 있습니다.</p>
                <p>사용법이 매우 간단합니다. 원격 호스트의 IP/도메인 주소를 입력한 다음 방금 추가한 메뉴 항목에서 호스트를 클릭하면 됩니다.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_menu_remote_add.png" alt="add remote host">
                </p>
                <p>컴퓨터를 연결할 수 있도록 하려면 설정 -> 서비스를 열고 <b>원격 접근</b>을 사용 가능으로 전환하고 암호를 설정해야 합니다.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/document/misc/filecxx_settings_enable_remote_access.png" alt="enable remote access">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <h3>명령 행</h3>
                <p>filec remote_access on</p>
                <p>filec service_port 10111</p>
                <p>filec service_password your_password</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">다운로드</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>공유</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>SSH 파일 관리자</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede는 SSH 파일 관리자이기도 하며 디렉터리 또는 전체 SSH 사이트를 포함한 SSH 서버에서 파일을 다운로드하고 업로드할 수 있습니다.</p>
                <p>
이 기능은 매우 사용하기 쉽고, 많은 설정을 입력할 필요가 없으며, 주소 표시줄에 호스트 주소를 입력하기만 하면 됩니다.</p>
                <p>
                    <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_ssh.png" width="800" alt="SSH file manager">
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
디렉터리 파일 나열 속도를 최대화하려면 다음과 같이 하십시오.
File Centipede는 방문한 모든 디렉터리 파일을 캐시할 수 있으며, 다음에 나열할 때 동일한 디렉터리가 로컬 디렉터리를 여는 것과 같습니다.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">다운로드</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>공유</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">

        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">한국어</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>비디오 다운로드기</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
File Centipede는 99% 이상의 웹 사이트에서 동영상을 다운로드할 수 있습니다.</p>
                <p>
또한 Javascript에서 비디오 주소를 분석하고 Javascript 폐쇄에서 해독된 비디오 키를 추출할 수 있습니다.
일부 특수 웹 사이트의 경우 파일 지네만 비디오를 다운로드할 수 있습니다.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
그것은 웹 페이지에서 비디오나 오디오를 다운로드하는 두 가지 쉬운 방법을 제공했습니다.
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                <p>
1: 동영상 옆에 있는 플로팅 표시줄에서 다운로드합니다.</p>
            </div>

            <div>
                <img src="../../images/extension_video_bar.png" alt="download web video">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <p class="article_">
2: 팝업 창에서 다운로드합니다.</p>
            <div>
                <img src="../../images/extension_videos.png" alt="download web videos from popup">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../documentation/browser_integration.html" class="article_">설치 방법 브라우저 확장</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">다운로드</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>공유</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

    <meta name="description" content="File centipede는 올인원 인터넷 파일 업로드/다운로드 관리자, BitTorrent 클라이언트, WebDAV 클라이언트, FTP 클라이언트 및 SSH 클라이언트입니다. 빠르고 사용자 지정 가능하며 사용자 친화적으로 설계되었습니다. 다중 프로토콜을 지원하며 HTTP 요청자, 파일 병합 및 인코더와 같은 유용한 보조 도구가 많이 포함되어 있습니다. 브라우저 통합을 통해 웹 사이트에서 오디오 및 비디오를 다운로드할 수 있으며 암호화된 비디오도 다운로드할 수 있습니다."/>

        <div class="section description" id="description">
            <h2>설명</h2>
            <div id="description_text">File centipede는 올인원 인터넷 파일 업로드/다운로드 관리자, BitTorrent 클라이언트, WebDAV 클라이언트, FTP 클라이언트 및 SSH 클라이언트입니다. 빠르고 사용자 지정 가능하며 사용자 친화적으로 설계되었습니다. 다중 프로토콜을 지원하며 HTTP 요청자, 파일 병합 및 인코더와 같은 유용한 보조 도구가 많이 포함되어 있습니다. 브라우저 통합을 통해 웹 사이트에서 오디오 및 비디오를 다운로드할 수 있으며 암호화된 비디오도 다운로드할 수 있습니다.</div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">

        </div>

                <a class="button" href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/jeekmibdibcjeihbjnjgbegjalfelhon" target="_blank">온라인 설치</a>
            </div>

            <div class="platform_">
                <h4>Chrome Manifest V2</h4>
                <a class="button" href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/raw/main/release/chrome.zip">다운로드 링크1</a>

        <div class="section features" id="features">
            <div style="position: relative">
                <h2 style="display: inline-block;text-align: left">기능</h2>
            </div>
            <table class="grid" style="width: 100%">
                <thead>
                <tr><td>기능</td><td style="width: 140px">최소 버전</td></tr>
                </thead>

                <tbody>
                <tr><td>HTTP, HTTPS 프로토콜 (gzip, 다시 시작 가능, 다중 연결과 같은 기본 기능은 나열되지 않습니다.)</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>FTP, FTPS 프로토콜</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>자석, 해시 주소</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>BitTorrent</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Thunder, flashget, qqdl과 같은 기타 사용자 지정 프로토콜</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>JSON 형식 주소</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>m3u8 스트림 작업</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>스트림 작업 AES-128 암호 해독 (SAMPLE-AES 암호 해독은 아직 지원되지 않음)</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>HTTP 쿠키, 헤더, 사용자 지정 포함 사용자 에이전트</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>토렌트 시딩 제한</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>전송 작업 구성을 동적으로 편집</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>거머리 방지</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>만료된 주소 새로 고침</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>카탈로그</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>다운로드, 업로드 속도 제한</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>사용자 지정 주소 만들기 (filec, fileu)</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>프록시 관리</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>필터 사용자 지정</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>트래커 관리</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>작업 세부사항</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>작업에서 토렌트 내보내기</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>다국어</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>대기열 또는 무제한 동시성 설정</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Chrome 브라우저 통합</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Firefox 브라우저 통합</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>웹 페이지에서 비디오, 오디오 캡처</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>웹 페이지에서 모든 자석 찾기</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>번역 도구</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>HTTP 도구</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>URI 인코더/디코더 도구</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>Base64 인코딩/디코드 도구</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>정규식 테스트 도구</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>토렌트 만들기</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>자석 도구에 토렌트</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>자석을 토렌트 도구</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>파일 병합 도구</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>통계</td><td>1.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>웹 페이지에서 모든 링크 다운로드</td><td>1.6</td></tr>
                <tr><td>SSH, SFTP 프로토콜</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>curl, wget, aria2, axel 명령행</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>WebDAV 프로토콜</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>파일 업로드</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>업로드 디렉터리</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>다운로드 디렉터리</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>모든 기능을 갖춘 WebDAV 파일 관리자</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>전체 기능을 갖춘 FTP 파일 관리자</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>전체 기능을 갖춘 SSH (sftp) 파일 관리자</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>파일 브라우저 영구 캐시</td><td>2.0</td></tr>
                <tr><td>사이트 규칙</td><td>2.1</td></tr>
                <tr><td>체크섬 도구</td><td>2.3</td></tr>
                <tr><td>원격 다운로드</td><td>2.6</td></tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>
        </div>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="../index.html">홈</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="../index.html#features">기능</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="../download.html">다운로드</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="../screenshot.html">스크린샷</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="../index.html#user_reviews">사용자 리뷰</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="../documentation.html">문서</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">한국어</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    

    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>Linux 다운로드 관리자</h1>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
<p>File Centipede는 최고의 Linux 다운로드 관리자입니다.</p>
<p>모든 주류 프로토콜과 비디오 탐지기의 리눅스 다운로드 관리자를 지원하는 유일한 것입니다.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_add_task.png" alt="file centipede add task">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
또한 파일 병합, 체크섬, Base64-인코더, Uri-인코더 및 자석을 토렌트와 같은 수많은 보조 도구가 포함되어 있습니다.......
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_file_merge.png" alt="file merge">
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_checksum_tool.png" alt="file checksum">
            </div>

            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/tools/screenshot_magnet2torrent.png" alt="magnet to torrent">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
또한 WebDav, FTP 및 SSH와 같은 원격 파일을 관리하는 데 사용될 수도 있습니다.
            </div>
            <div class="article_">
                <img src="../../images/screenshot_software_file_browser_webdav.png" alt="file centipede remote file manager" width="800">
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <div class="article_">
                
설치가 매우 쉽고 한 번의 클릭만으로 다른 동적 라이브러리 요구 사항이 없으며 Glibc도 없습니다.
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <a href="../download.html" class="button">다운로드</a>
        </div>

        <div class="section" id="shares">
    <h2>공유</h2>
    <div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
    </div>

        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>
    </div>
</div>

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>

<script>
    load_sponsors = function(list)
    {
        if(!(list instanceof Array)){
            return;
        }
        var tbody = document.getElementById("sponsors_tbody");

        for(var i=0;i<list.length;++i)
        {
            var row     = list[i];
            var tr      = document.createElement("tr");
            var name    = document.createElement("td");
            var logo    = document.createElement("td");
            var text    = document.createElement("td");
            var balance = document.createElement("td");

            logo.innerHTML    = "<img src='http://w.filecxx.com/tpl/"+row.logo+"' style='max-height: 150px;max-width: 250px'>";
            text.innerText    = row.text;
            name.innerText    = row.name;
            balance.innerHTML = row.balance;

            tr.appendChild(logo);
            tr.appendChild(text);
            tr.appendChild(name);
            tr.appendChild(balance);

            tbody.appendChild(tr);
        }
    }
</script>
<script src="https://w.filecxx.com/action.php?act=sponsors&callback=load_sponsors"></script>
<script src="../script/base.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
        c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};

        y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
    })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "dk9clgn4o4");
</script>

        <div class="detail_">
            <div class="version_">

                <b>2.82</b>
                <span style="color: green">(2023.02.06)</span>
                <span> - </span>

            </div>

            </div>

<div class="footer">
    <div class="copyright_">
        <span>© 2022</span>
        <div class="email_">
            <b>EMAIL:</b>
            <a href="mailto:123123@123.com" id="contact_email">123123@123.com</a>
        </div>
        <div class="contact_"></div>

File: ko_KR/update_log.html
