<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">

    <title>업데이트 로그 - File Centipede</title>
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="icon" href="../favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../style/base.css">
    <style>
        li{
            font-size: 16px;
            padding: 4px 8px 4px 8px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

<div class="central">
    <div class="nav">
    <div class="links_">
        <a class="tool_button home_" href="index.html#">홈</a>
        <a class="tool_button features_" href="index.html#features">기능</a>
        <a class="tool_button download_" href="download.html">다운로드</a>
        <a class="tool_button screenshot_" href="screenshot.html">스크린샷</a>
        <a class="tool_button user_reviews_" href="index.html#user_reviews">사용자 리뷰</a>
        <a class="tool_button documentation_" href="documentation.html">문서</a>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="header">
    <div class="top_">
        <a href="http://filecxx.com" class="logo_"></a>
        <div class="name_">
            <h1><a href="http://filecxx.com">File Centipede</a></h1>
            <div class="text_"> - Since 2022</div>
        </div>
        <div class="languages_">
            <div class="current_">한국어</div>
            <div class="items_">
                <a class="item_" href="/en_US/index.html">English</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_CN/index.html">简体中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/zh_TW/index.html">繁體中文</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ru_RU/index.html">Русский</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/ko_KR/index.html">한국어</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/de_DE/index.html">Deutsch</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/id_ID/index.html">Indonesia</a>
                <a class="item_" href="/tr_TR/index.html">Turkish</a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>


    <div class="body">
        <div class="section">
            <h1>업데이트 로그</h1>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.82 (uptime: 2023.02.06)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Fully shutdown.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>When the remote HTTP server sends error data without disconnecting, causing this segment of data not to be downloaded and the final file size to not match the remote one, this scenario is likely to occur when the remote connection is unstable or frequently switches proxy IPs.</p>
            <p>When downloading a file from the file browser, the file save path follows the catalog instead of the user choosing one.</p>
            <p>The browser extension gets the wrong cookies from the incognito window.</p>

            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>Change the default parallel option to "Fastest".</p>
            <p>FileCXX private DHT network module (libdybn) has been removed, using BitTorrent public DHT network as the alternate.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.81 (uptime: 2023.1.6)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Language: Tiếng Việt</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTP task infinite redirect when reading partial content gets 301 code.</p>
            <p>When downloading a large number of small files, repeatedly stopping or deleting tasks may cause errors in tasks that are waiting in the queue, indirectly causing filec to crash.</p>
            <p>When the taskbar tray icon is clicked, the window does not become the top window.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.8 stable (uptime: 2022.12.31)</h3>
            <p>
                This is the last version of FileCentipede2. The development of the next major version 3.0 has started.<br/><br/>
                If you have any feature requests, please post them on
                <a href="https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/discussions/402">https://github.com/filecxx/FileCentipede/discussions/402</a>
            </p>

            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.8</p>
            <p>Language file "ru_RU.lang" updated.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>URL directory parse error, such as "http://localhost/a=1&b=/dir/file".</p>
            <p>The FTP task becomes stuck in the stopping state if the connection fails.</p>
            <p>Unable to receive FTP file list when remote FTP server sends code 226 before sending the file list.</p>
            <p>The browser extension shows "Send failed" when getting an URL that starts with "blob:".</p>
            <p>The browser extension sometimes fails to obtain the cookie information for a URL.</p>
            <p>A new strategy for downloading protected m3u8 segments.</p>
            <p>In some cases, the downloaded file is m3u8 content instead of a video.</p>
            <p>m3u8 png segments.</p>
            <p>m3u8 parsing segment URL lost the last character when the m3u8 file did not end with a newline.</p>
            <p>Use "filename*=UTF-8" as the preferred filename instead of "filename=".</p>
            <p>The "Blocks" from the detail panel are displayed reversely when the HTTP task is not resumable.</p>
            <p>Unlocked variables caused the filec process to crash.</p>
            <p>The settings from the 'Update-dialog' cannot be saved.</p>
            <p>Display an error message when the remote client fails to connect.</p>
            <p>Increase the SSH maximum connect timeout to 120 seconds, rather than the current 12 seconds.</p>
            <p>filec crashes if the remote HTTP response headers include both 'content-range' and 'transfer-encoding' at the same time.</p>
            <p>When downloading multiple files with the same file name but different contents simultaneously, the automatic renaming function may potentially cause errors in writing to the files due to a lack of locking, indirectly causing filec to crash.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.7 (uptime: 2022.08.29)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>URI generator (from URI tool)</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>thread deadlock</p>
            <p>unable to download files when HTTP server response conflicted headers: Accept-Ranges, Content-Range, Content-Encoding</p>
            <p>unable to download files when HTTP server response transfer_encoding is chunked with 0-byte data</p>
            <p>magnet-task causing filec crashes during multiple times of adding and canceling.</p>
            <p>ESC key on dialog</p>
            <p>duplicate shortcut key</p>
            <p>fileu dialog crashes</p>
            <p>fileu status bar DHT number was inaccurate.</p>
            <p>remote client crashes on windows 7</p>
            <p>torrent-task directory icon missed after restarting filec</p>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.6 & 2.61 (uptime: 2022.08.21)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Remote download manager (NativeUI, not WebUI)</p>
            <p>File browser: copy file URL, path</p>
            <p>Command line: service_port, service_password, remote_access</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.7</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>(2.61) downgrade wolfssl to 5.4.0 </p>
            <p>Cannot save options from the software's update dialog.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when deleting an SSH or FTP directory and then canceling it.</p>

        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.5 (uptime: 2022.08.13)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Save column width.</p>
            <p>Save window position. (default: off)</p>
            <p>Force restart</p>
            <p>Add trackers from the subscribed list.</p>
            <p>Command line: create_torrent</p>
            <p>Language: português</p>
            <p>Translation tool: select languages directory</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>When remote HTTP server received range: bytes=0-0, but continue response more data, causing task progress over 100%.</p>
            <p>Max Connect timeout up to 120s instead of 12s</p>
            <p>File name incomplete when remote HTTP server response header field content-disposition contains multiple "=?UTF8?B?" sections.</p>
            <p>Auto upgrade software.</p>
        </div>


        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.4 (uptime: 2022.08.02)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Tray icon event for windows.</p>
            <p>Set all new tasks save-path from the Add-task-dialog.</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>After pausing and resuming an HTTP task, the task progress reset to 0.</p>
            <p>Auto-created host's default config error when entering address from the file browser's address bar.</p>
            <p>File browser extracts username and password from URL.</p>
            <p>Remove the default path "/" from the file browser.</p>
            <p>Remove the checkbox from torrent confirm-dialog when the torrent only has one file.</p>
            <p>Torrent confirm-dialog file size missing when the torrent only has one file.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.3 (uptime: 2022.08.01)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Browser extension up to 1.5, massively optimized, it can extract videos from javascript.</p>
            <p>File checksum tool (text, file, directory).</p>
            <p>File size filter for torrent-task.</p>
            <p>Taskbar progress for windows</p>
            <p>Alert setting: delete task</p>
            <p>Alert setting: delete catalog</p>
            <p>Stream-task settings: Base URL, Key, IV</p>
            <p>Merge tool: video+audio merge (FFmpeg required)</p>
            <p>Language Français</p>
            <p>Language Nederlands</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>announce_to_all_tiers and announce_to_all_trackers set as default.</p>
            <p>HTTPS trackers (Linux)</p>
            <p>filec crashes when HTTP cookies over 4 KB.</p>
            <p>Convert URI space to "%20" instead of "+"</p>
            <p>m3u8 merge files error on windows7</p>
            <p>uploaded directories displayed as regular files from the file browser.</p>
            <p>SSH connections timed out but the state was still connected.</p>
            <p>SSH file manager "operation failed" error.</p>
            <p>When resuming an HTTP task and the URL address was expired causing an incomplete file to be downloaded. (New bug since 2.0)</p>
            <p>Torrent-task inaccurate statistics.</p>
            <p>Torrent-task rename from confirm-dialog failed.</p>
            <p>m3u8 parse error.</p>
            <p>Clipboard multiple triggers.</p>
            <p>HTTP-task filename with =?UTF-8?B?</p>
            <p>fileu incomplete task list (fully fixed).</p>
            <p>fileu directory icon.</p>
            <p>fileu window randomly activated.</p>
            <p>DHT 0</p>
            <p>...</p>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.21 (uptime: 2022.07.02)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>stream-task 401, 403 error.</p>
            <p>stream-task HTTP 302 redirect causing filec crashes.</p>
            <p>stream-task merge file error after pausing and resuming the task.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.2 (uptime: 2022.06.30)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>torrent port setting</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>"CheckBox" for torrent-task subdirectories</p>
            <p>torrent-task state display as completed but still seeding.</p>
            <p>torrent-task lost the resume-data in some cases.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.1 (uptime: 2022.06.29)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>site rules</p>
            <p>language zh_TW</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>WebDAV default config error for file downloading.</p>
            <p>torrent-task is not able to stop when checking files.</p>
            <p>when the HTTP server response code is 401 or 403, remove the "Referer" and "Origin" fields from HTTP headers before resending the HTTP request.</p>
            <p>some web servers accepted HTTP range requests but the response code is 200 with 0-byte content, instead of 201, causing a 0-byte file to be downloaded. (wingftp)</p>
            <p>torrent-task files rename failed after multiple tries.</p>
            <p>FTP server 504 error (CLNT, OPTS UTF8 ON).</p>
            <p>DateTime 0.000000.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.02 (uptime: 2022.06.25)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>redundant path separator</p>
            <p>XML tag case-sensitive caused the WebDAV list directory to fail.</p>
            <p>file has not been removed from the file browser list when the remote directory path is  /</p>
            <p>when uploading/downloading a directory max connections have been reduced when the directory contains a small file.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>2.0/2.01 (uptime: 2022.06.24)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>opening a task file show an alert when the file has been deleted or moved.</p>
            <p>context-menu for torrent confirm-dialog</p>
            <p>supported command line: curl, wget, aria2, axel</p>
            <p>option: silent mode</p>
            <p>detail panel: blocks</p>
            <p>detail panel: connections</p>
            <p>protocol: SSH(sftp)</p>
            <p>option: proxy modes (Always, If_Available, Round_Robin, Round_Robin_Connections)</p>
            <p>option: no task record</p>
            <p>option: parallel (smooth, fastest)</p>
            <p>settings: stream task</p>
            <p>settings: SSH</p>
            <p>settings: File Browser</p>
            <p>download directory & upload directory</p>
            <p>file browser, network file manager for WebDAV, WebDAVS, FTP, FTPS, SSH(SFTP)</p>
            <p>...</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>filec fails to start when the database file is broken.</p>
            <p>global-speed-limit settings for stream tasks.</p>
            <p>file icon association error on windows.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when the service receives an empty request.</p>
            <p>filec crashes when the local network is unavailable.</p>
            <p>ftp compatibility for non-standard server.</p>
            <p>HTTP cookie containing a "secure" field case endless loop.</p>
            <p>when add-task dialog switching the URL config causing fields are missed.</p>
            <p>stream-task missing completed dialog.</p>
            <p>tasks-detail update data is in slow motion.</p>
            <p>tray icon show/hide fails in some case.</p>
            <p>http-task state frozen when the response body is empty.</p>
            <p>torrent-confirm dialog information error.</p>
            <p>an invalid file is downloaded when the HTTP response code is 206 and the keep-alive is false.</p>
            <p>incomplete encoded URI path.</p>
            <p>encode URI path before sending the HTTP header.</p>
            <p>stream-task HTTP response code 474 marked as server busy.</p>
            <p>copy address from task error (std::string_view out of scope).</p>
            <p>an empty file was downloaded when the HTTP response headers contained content-encoding and content-range.</p>
            <p>"Host" field in HTTP headers.</p>
            <p>translation tool: Israel has been removed from the Arabic countries list.</p>
            <p>heap-use-after-free.</p>
            <p>uncaught exceptions.</p>
            <p>memory overflowed.</p>
            <p>...</p>
            <h4>Changes:</h4>
            <p>few</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.9 (uptime: 2022.03.27)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>The downloaded file is 1 byte when the HTTP header field "content-range" did not contain the "bytes" string</p>
            <p>HTTP request range limitations</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.8 (uptime: 2022.03.26)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Ignore this site -> browser extensions</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.4</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>The rename dialog is behind the confirm-dialog (windows only)</p>
            <p>Open directory did not work when save-path is the root directory (windows only)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.7 (uptime: 2022.03.25)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Add context menu on confirm-links dialog</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>Process filec.exe froze when HTTP response header no charset and "attachment;filename=" contains a non-utf8 string (windows only, caused by MinGW)</p>
            <p>Not able to change proxy on task-edit dialog</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.6 (uptime: 2022.03.25)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Sound effects when task download completed or error. (optional)</p>
            <p>Browser extensions up to 1.3</p>
            <p>Download all links from the web page</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>UI configs are lost when upgrading to a new version.</p>
            <p>On windows7, fileu std::filesystem::path error (caused by MinGW).</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.5 (uptime: 2022.03.22)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>File last modified time from HTTP server</p>
            <p>Show HTTP, Torrent confirming-dialog on top</p>
            <p>Task completed dialog</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>302 redirect on stream task</p>
            <p>Datetime format changed from GTM to ISO YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss</p>
            <p>fileu.exe is hidden when launched from Windows system service. (from browser extension after reboot)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.4 (uptime: 2022.03.20)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Add/Remove User agents.</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTP tasks lost 1 byte after during pause and restart the task. (critical)</p>
            <p>Some websites have HTTP range request limitations, auto-ban small range requests, cause download errors.</p>
            <p>History path</p>
            <p>Windows DPI</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.3 (uptime: 2022.03.18)</h3>
            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>Users can change the software name during installation.</p>
            <p>Switch download manager from browser extension popup panel.</p>
            <p>Show confirm-dialog when tasks are sent from the web browser.</p>
            <p>Add new option "Without confirm" to HTTP settings</p>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>HTTPS request fails when the port is not 443</p>
            <p>The translation tool inserted redundant backslashes into the string</p>
            <p>System service from settings is enabled when installing without system service</p>
            <p>Add 5 DHT bootstrap nodes</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.2 (uptime: 2022.03.16)</h3>
            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>filec.exe fails to start when the desktop environment is non-English (windows only)</p>
        </div>
        <div class="section">
            <h3>1.1 (uptime: 2022.03.15)</h3>

            <h4>New:</h4>
            <p>save window size</p>
            <p>auto add trackers to the new task (including downloads)</p>

            <h4>Fixed:</h4>
            <p>few</p>

            (uninstall before installing the new version)
        </div>
    </div>

  "collector_notify_": {
    "message": "Collector mode is only effective when the window is open; closing the window will lose all records.<br/> Due to browser limitations and website download chain rules, not all videos can be previewed.<br/> Some videos cannot be previewed but can be downloaded.<br/> Some videos cannot be previewed and cannot be downloaded."
  },
  "collector_mode_help_text_": {
    "message": "In Collector mode, when opened, it initially lists all media resources obtained from the currently open tabs, and newly obtained ones will also be added to the Collector mode list. These records will disappear when the window is closed.<br/><br/>Note that due to browser limitations, when the number of videos exceeds 5000, the Referer HTTP header cannot be set, causing some resources on certain websites to be unpreviewable.<br/><br/>Browsers have limitations on HTTP concurrent connections, preventing too many videos from playing simultaneously and limiting the number of video elements that can be created (approximately 100 in Chrome), consuming a significant amount of memory and CPU resources.<br/><br/>Optimization: All previewed videos are dynamically loaded based on the scrollbar position; invisible videos are automatically removed and their snapshots saved. They will be recreated when visible again, causing intermittent pauses if 'Play All' is enabled and the network is slow.<br/><br/>Collector mode is currently in beta; feel free to provide feedback if you encounter any issues."
  },

    "message": "The third-party query interface and file detection feature serve different purposes. <br/>Sometimes, on certain specially processed websites, files may not be easily detectable. This feature is designed to address that issue! You can easily extract file download links from specific web pages by writing scripts, or check for files on other servers or local applications using HTTP interactions. While there are third-party applications that can perform similar tasks, this feature simplifies the process with one-click downloading, improving overall efficiency."

    },
    "collector_mode_help_text_": {
        "message": "In Collector mode, when opened, it initially lists all media resources obtained from the currently open tabs, and newly obtained ones will also be added to the Collector mode list. These records will disappear when the window is closed.<br/><br/>Note that due to browser limitations, when the number of videos exceeds 5000, the Referer HTTP header cannot be set, causing some resources on certain websites to be unpreviewable.<br/><br/>Browsers have limitations on HTTP concurrent connections, preventing too many videos from playing simultaneously and limiting the number of video elements that can be created (approximately 100 in Chrome), consuming a significant amount of memory and CPU resources.<br/><br/>Optimization: All previewed videos are dynamically loaded based on the scrollbar position; invisible videos are automatically removed and their snapshots saved. They will be recreated when visible again, causing intermittent pauses if 'Play All' is enabled and the network is slow.<br/><br/>Collector mode is currently in beta; feel free to provide feedback if you encounter any issues."

        "message": "The third-party query interface and file detection feature serve different purposes. <br/>Sometimes, on certain specially processed websites, files may not be easily detectable. This feature is designed to address that issue! You can easily extract file download links from specific web pages by writing scripts, or check for files on other servers or local applications using HTTP interactions. While there are third-party applications that can perform similar tasks, this feature simplifies the process with one-click downloading, improving overall efficiency."

Catatan ini akan hilang ketika jendela ditutup.<br/><br/>Perhatikan bahwa karena keterbatasan browser, ketika jumlah video melebihi 5000, rujukan header HTTP tidak dapat disetel, menyebabkan beberapa sumber daya di situs web tertentu tidak dapat dipratinjau.<br/><br/>Browser memiliki batasan pada koneksi HTTP yang bersamaan, mencegah terlalu banyak video diputar secara bersamaan dan membatasi jumlah elemen video yang dapat dibuat (sekitar 100 di Chrome), sehingga menghabiskan banyak memori dan sumber daya CPU.<br/><br/>Optimasi: Semua video yang dipratinjau dimuat secara dinamis berdasarkan posisi bilah gulir; video yang tidak terlihat dihapus secara otomatis dan cuplikannya disimpan. Mereka akan dibuat ulang ketika terlihat kembali, sehingga menyebabkan jeda terputus-putus jika 'Putar Semua' diaktifkan dan jaringan lambat.<br/><br/>Mode kolektor saat ini dalam versi beta; jangan ragu untuk memberikan umpan balik jika anda mengalami masalah."

    "filename_rule_tips_": {
        "message": "Uses CSS selector rules to retrieve the text of a specified element on the webpage as the preferred filename for media files in that domain.<br/> If retrieval fails, it will still use the title or og:title as the filename."

    "download_manager_tip_": {
        "message": "Default download manager used when downloading files."
    },
    "collector_mode_tip_": {
        "message": "Records all media resources captured on webpages,<br/> and performs batch preview and filtering when necessary,<br/> reducing repetitive work."
    },
    "collector_notify_": {
        "message": "Collector mode is only effective when the window is open; closing the window will lose all records.<br/> Due to browser limitations and website download chain rules, not all videos can be previewed.<br/> Some videos cannot be previewed but can be downloaded.<br/> Some videos cannot be previewed and cannot be downloaded."
    },
    "collector_mode_help_text_": {
        "message": "In Collector mode, when opened, it initially lists all media resources obtained from the currently open tabs, and newly obtained ones will also be added to the Collector mode list. These records will disappear when the window is closed.<br/><br/>Note that due to browser limitations, when the number of videos exceeds 5000, the Referer HTTP header cannot be set, causing some resources on certain websites to be unpreviewable.<br/><br/>Browsers have limitations on HTTP concurrent connections, preventing too many videos from playing simultaneously and limiting the number of video elements that can be created (approximately 100 in Chrome), consuming a significant amount of memory and CPU resources.<br/><br/>Optimization: All previewed videos are dynamically loaded based on the scrollbar position; invisible videos are automatically removed and their snapshots saved. They will be recreated when visible again, causing intermittent pauses if 'Play All' is enabled and the network is slow.<br/><br/>Collector mode is currently in beta; feel free to provide feedback if you encounter any issues."
    },
    "settings_tip_": {
        "message": "Detailed settings for the extension."

    },
    "collector_mode_help_text_": {
        "message": "콜렉터 모드는 열릴 때 현재 모든 탭에서 이미 가져온 미디어 리소스를 먼저 나열한 후 그 후에 가져온 리소스도 콜렉터 모드 목록에 추가합니다. 창을 닫으면이 모든 기록이 사라집니다. 브라우저의 제한으로 인해 비디오 수가 5000 개를 초과하면 더 이상 Referer HTTP 헤더를 설정할 수 없으며 일부 웹 사이트 리소스는 미리 볼 수 없습니다. 브라우저는 HTTP 동시 연결에 제한이 있어 동시에 너무 많은 비디오를 재생할 수 없으며 비디오 요소의 생성 수도 제한되어 있습니다(크롬에서 약 100 개). 이로 인해 많은 메모리 및 CPU 리소스가 소모됩니다. 최적화: 모든 미리 보기된 비디오는 스크롤 위치에 따라 동적으로로드되며 보이지 않는 비디오는 자동으로 제거되고 비디오의 스냅 샷이 저장되며 다시 보일 때 자동으로 다시 만들어집니다. 네트워크가 나쁜 경우 '모두 재생'을 활성화하면 간헐적으로 일시 중지될 수 있습니다. 콜렉터 모드는 현재 베타 버전이므로 문제가 있으면 피드백을 환영합니다."

    "collector_mode_tip_": {
        "message": "Records all media resources captured on webpages,<br/> and performs batch preview and filtering when necessary, <br/>reducing repetitive work."
    },
    "collector_notify_": {
        "message": "Collector mode is only effective when the window is open; closing the window will lose all records.<br/> Due to browser limitations and website download chain rules, not all videos can be previewed.<br/> Some videos cannot be previewed but can be downloaded.<br/> Some videos cannot be previewed and cannot be downloaded."
    },
    "collector_mode_help_text_": {
        "message": "In Collector mode, when opened, it initially lists all media resources obtained from the currently open tabs, and newly obtained ones will also be added to the Collector mode list. These records will disappear when the window is closed.<br/><br/>Note that due to browser limitations, when the number of videos exceeds 5000, the Referer HTTP header cannot be set, causing some resources on certain websites to be unpreviewable.<br/><br/>Browsers have limitations on HTTP concurrent connections, preventing too many videos from playing simultaneously and limiting the number of video elements that can be created (approximately 100 in Chrome), consuming a significant amount of memory and CPU resources.<br/><br/>Optimization: All previewed videos are dynamically loaded based on the scrollbar position; invisible videos are automatically removed and their snapshots saved. They will be recreated when visible again, causing intermittent pauses if 'Play All' is enabled and the network is slow.<br/><br/>Collector mode is currently in beta; feel free to provide feedback if you encounter any issues."
    },

        "message": "Detailed settings for the extension."

While there are third-party applications that can perform similar tasks, this feature simplifies the process with one-click downloading, improving overall efficiency."

You can easily extract file download links from specific web pages by writing scripts, or check for files on other servers or local applications using HTTP interactions. While there are third-party applications that can perform similar tasks, this feature simplifies the process with one-click downloading, improving overall efficiency."

    "collector_mode_help_text_": {
      "message": "收集器模式在打开时候会首先列出当前所有标签页中已经获取到的媒体资源, 之后获取到的也会加入到收集器模式列表中, 当窗口关闭时候这些记录都会消失.<br/><br/>需要注意, 由于浏览器的限制, 当视频数量超过5000时候无法再设置Referer HTTP 头, 会导致有一些网站的资源无法被预览. <br/><br/>浏览器对HTTP并发连接具有限制, 无法同时播放太多的视频，并且限制了创建video元素的数量(chrome下大约100个), 并且会消耗大量的内存和CPU资源.<br/><br/>优化: 所有预览的视频是根据滚动条位置动态加载的, 不可见的视频都会被自动移除, 并保存视频的截图, 再次可见时候又会自动创建, 网络不佳时候如果启动了 '播放全部' 会导致间断性的停顿. <br/><br/>收集器模式目前属于beta版本, 有任何问题欢迎进行反馈.<br/>"

install_notice2_=Diese Software hat keine zentralen Servermaschinen und wird nicht mit irgendwelchen Geschäftsorganisationen oder Behörden zusammenarbeiten, um private Daten und Übertragungshistorie auf Ihrem Gerät zu scannen und hochzuladen. Wenn Sie jedoch keinen Verschlüsselungsproxy oder VPN verwenden, haben der ISP (Internet Service Provider) und einige Routerhersteller immer noch die Möglichkeit, Ihre Netzwerkanfragedaten zu überwachen und zu sammeln.<br/><br/>Nach dem Start der Software wird Ihr Gerät ein Knoten der verteilten Hash-Tabelle sein, der dazu dient, Torrent-Metadaten zu speichern, die zu Magnet-Links gehören, die von anderen Benutzern aus dem verteilten Netzwerk geteilt werden. Dies wird eine sehr geringe Menge an Netzwerkverkehr und RAM verbrauchen, um anderen Benutzern zu helfen. Dieser Prozess wird Ihre IP-Adresse nicht aufzeichnen und falsche Daten generieren, um bösartige Angreifer zu täuschen. Wenn Sie damit nicht einverstanden sind, wird Ihre Nutzung der Software zu einer Belastung für die gesamte ökologische Umgebung. Sie sollten die Installation abbrechen. Wenn Sie fortfahren, bedeutet das, dass Sie mit dieser Klausel einverstanden sind.

leeches_description_=Leeches laden nur Daten herunter und laden keine Daten zu anderen Peers hoch, dieses Verhalten führt zu einer langsamen Download-Geschwindigkeit für andere Peers und führt zu einem vorzeitigen Ausfall der Ressourcen.<br/><br/>Aber das Bannen von IP-Adressen ist keine gute Idee, denn in einigen großen LAN-Ländern weist der ISP mehr als 100 Nutzern eine dynamische IP-Adresse zu, und mehrere Nutzer können gleichzeitig gebannt werden. <br/><br/>Andere BitTorrent-Clients wie aria2-basierte, laden Daten während des Download-Prozesses hoch, aber wenn der Download vorbei ist, beendet der Prozess, es sollte nicht als ein Leech-Client betrachtet werden, sondern sollte die Upload-Priorität reduzieren.

================
File: lang/software/en_US.lang
================
parallel=Parallel
remote=Remote
default=Default
address_expired=Address expired
enable_proxy=Enable proxy
target=Target
no_catalog=No catalog
delete_task_and_file=Delete task and file
unknown_error=Unknown error
leeches_description_=Leeches only download data and won't upload data to other peers, this behavior will lead to a slow download speed for other peers and cause premature failure of resources.<br/><br/>but banning IP addresses is not a good idea, because in some large LAN countries, the ISP will assign a dynamic IP address to more than 100 users, and multiple users may be got banned at the same time. <br/><br/>Other BitTorrent clients such as aria2-based, will upload data during the download process, but when the download is over, the process will exit, it shouldn't be considered as a leech client but should reduce the upload priority.
creator=Creator
filec_link_help_=If you are a resource provider, you can create a filec link and put some restrictions on it. For example, if a user wants to increase their download speed, they might set the maximum number of connections to 1000. However, this setting will not actually increase the download speed and may instead overload the server.<br/><br/>filec links also have the ability to hide the origin address and set additional request data.

leeches_description_=Los usuarios sanguijuela solo descargan datos y no los comparten a otros pares, este comportamiento conducirá a una velocidad de descarga lenta para otros pares y provocará fallas prematuras de los recursos.<br/><br/>Prohibir direcciones IP no es una buena idea, porque en algunos países LAN grandes, el ISP asignará una dirección IP dinámica a más de 100 usuarios y es posible que se prohíban varios usuarios al mismo tiempo. <br/><br/>Otros clientes de BitTorrent, como los basados en aria2, cargarán datos durante el proceso de descarga, pero cuando finalice la descarga, el proceso saldrá, no debe considerarse como un cliente sanguijuela, pero debe reducir la prioridad de carga.

install_notice2_=Ce logiciel n'a pas de machines de serveurs centrales et ne coopérera pas avec des organisations commerciales ou des autorités pour scanner et télécharger des données privées et l'historique de transmission sur votre appareil, mais si vous n'utilisez pas de proxy de cryptage ou de VPN, le FAI (service InternetFournisseur) et certains fabricants de routeurs ont toujours la possibilité de surveiller et de collecter les données de la demande de réseau. <br/> <br/> Après avoir démarré le logiciel, votre appareil sera un nœud de la table de hachage distribuée, utilisé pour stocker les métadonnées torrent correspondantesPour les liens d'aimant partagés par d'autres utilisateurs du réseau distribué, il consommera une très petite quantité de trafic réseau et de RAM, qui est utilisée pour aider d'autres utilisateurs, ce processus n'enregistrera pas votre adresse IP et générera de fausses données pour tromper la malveillanceLes attaquants, si vous n'êtes pas d'accord avec cela, votre utilisation du logiciel deviendra un fardeau de l'environnement écologique entier, vous devez annuler l'installation, si vous continuez, cela signifie que vous êtes d'accord avec cette clause.

leeches_description_=Leech hanya mengunduh data dan tidak akan mengunggah data ke peer lain, perilaku ini akan menyebabkan lambatnya kecepatan unduh untuk peer lain dan menyebabkan kegagalan sumber daya terlalu dini.<br/><br/>tetapi melarang alamat IP bukanlah ide yang baik, karena di beberapa negara LAN besar, ISP akan menetapkan alamat IP dinamis ke lebih dari 100 pengguna, dan beberapa pengguna mungkin diblokir pada saat yang bersamaan. <br/><br/>Klien BitTorrent lain seperti berbasis aria2, akan mengunggah data selama proses pengunduhan, tetapi ketika pengunduhan selesai, proses akan berhenti, seharusnya tidak dianggap sebagai klien leech tetapi sebaiknya dikurangi prioritas pengunggahannya.

install_notice2_=Aplikasi ini tidak memiliki mesin server pusat, dan tidak akan bekerja sama dengan organisasi bisnis atau otoritas mana pun untuk memindai dan mengunggah data pribadi dan riwayat transmisi apa pun di perangkat anda, tetapi jika anda tidak menggunakan proxy enkripsi atau VPN, ISP (Penyedia Layanan Internet) dan beberapa produsen router masih memiliki kemampuan untuk memantau dan mengumpulkan data permintaan jaringan anda.<br/><br/>Setelah menjalankan aplikasi, perangkat anda akan menjadi node tabel hash terdistribusi, digunakan untuk menyimpan metadata torrent yang sesuai untuk menarik tautan yang dibagikan oleh pengguna lain dari jaringan terdistribusi, hal ini akan menghabiskan sejumlah kecil lalu lintas jaringan dan RAM, yang digunakan untuk membantu pengguna lain, proses ini tidak akan mencatat alamat IP anda, dan akan menghasilkan data palsu untuk menipu penyerang jahat, jika anda tidak setuju dengan ini, penggunaan anda atas aplikasi akan menjadi beban seluruh lingkungan ekologi, anda harus membatalkan instalasi, jika anda melanjutkan, berarti anda setuju dengan klausul ini.

filec_link_help_=もしあなたがリソースプロバイダーなら、filecリンクを作成し、それにいくつかの制限を加えることができます。ユーザーがダウンロード速度を上げるために最大接続数を1000に設定したような場合、この設定はダウンロード速度を上げるのではなく、サーバーに非常に高い負荷を与えます。<br/><br/>filecリンクは、オリジナルのアドレスを隠したり、追加のリクエストデータを設定したりすることもできます。<br/><br/>現在のバージョンは、HTTPとFTPからfilecへのリンク作成のみをサポートしています。

install_notice2_=このソフトは中央サーバーを持たず、いかなる企業組織や省庁とも協力せず、あなたのデバイス上のいかなる個人情報や送信履歴もアップロードすることはありませんが、暗号化プロキシやVPNを使用しない場合、ISP（インターネットサービスプロバイダ）や一部のルーターのメーカーは、あなたのネットワーク要求データを監視して収集することが可能です。<br/><br/>ソフトウェアを起動した後、あなたのデバイスは分散ハッシュテーブルのノードとなり、分散ネットワークから他のユーザーによって共有されたマグネットリンクに対応するトレントメタデータを保存するために使用され、それは他のユーザーを支援するために使用されるネットワークトラフィックとRAMの非常に小さな量を消費します。このプロセスは、あなたのIPアドレスを記録せず、悪意ある攻撃者を欺くために偽のデータを生成します。あなたがこれに同意しない場合は、ソフトウェアの使用は全体の環境の負担となるため、インストールを中止してください。インストールを続ける場合は、この条項に同意することを意味します。

leeches_description_=リーチャーはデータをダウンロードするだけで、他のピアにデータをアップロードしません。この動作は、他のピアのダウンロード速度を低下させ、リソースの早期故障の原因となります。<br/><br/>しかし、IPアドレスをBANするのは良いアイディアではありません。なぜなら、大きなLANの国では、ISPが100人以上のユーザーにダイナミックIPアドレスを割り当てることがあり、複数のユーザーが同時にBANされることがあるためです。<br/><br/>aria2ベースのような他のBitTorrentクライアントは、ダウンロードプロセス中にデータをアップロードしますが、ダウンロードが終わるとプロセスは終了するので、リーチクライアントとは見なされませんが、アップロードの優先順位は下がるはずです。

Takie zachowanie doprowadzi do niskiej prędkości pobierania innych urządzeń równorzędnych i spowoduje przedwczesną awarię zasobów.<br/><br/>ale blokowanie adresów IP nie jest dobrym pomysłem , ponieważ w niektórych krajach z dużą siecią LAN dostawca usług internetowych przydzieli dynamiczny adres IP ponad 100 użytkownikom, co może spowodować jednoczesne zablokowanie wielu użytkowników. <br/><br/>Inni klienci BitTorrent, np. oparty na aria2, będą przesyłać dane podczas procesu pobierania, ale po zakończeniu pobierania proces zostanie zakończony. Nie należy go uważać za klienta typu leech, ale powinien on zmniejszyć priorytet przesyłania.

install_notice2_=У этого ПО нет централизованных серверов, и оно не будет сотрудничать с какими-либо бизнесами и правительствами, чтобы сканировать и загружать любые приватные данные и историю запросов на вашем устройстве. Однако, если вы не используете шифрующий прокси или VPN, ваш интернет-провйдер и, в некоторых случаях, производитель сетевого оборудования (роутера), будут иметь возможность следить и собирать информацию о ваших сетевых запросах.<br/><br/>После запуска ПО, ваше устройство будет частью (нодом) распределённой хэш-таблицы, используемой для хранения метаданных торрентов, соответствующих magnet-ссылкам, которыми делятся другие пользователи этой сети. Это будет потреблять небольшое количество сетевого трафика и оперативной памяти. Этот процесс помогает другим пользователям, и не записывает ваш IP-адрес, также генерируя ложные данные для запутывания зловредных лиц, если они будут пытатья получить к ним доступ. Если вы не согласны с этим, ваше использование этого ПО становиться обременительным для всей сетевой среды, и вам нужно отменить установку. Продолжая установку, вы соглашаетесь с данным пунктом.

================
File: lang/software/vi_VN.lang
================
including_subdomains=Including subdomains
init_error=Lỗi khởi tạo
unfinished=Chưa hoàn tất
all_groups=Tất cả nhóm
target=Mục tiêu
no_catalog=Không có danh mục
delete_task_and_file=Xóa tác vụ và tệp
unknown_error=Lỗi không xác định
leeches_description_="\"Lấy phần\" để chỉ việc tải xuống dữ liệu xuống và không tải lên hay chia sẻ cho người dùng khác. Hành vi này sẽ dẫn đến tốc độ tải xuống chậm đối với người dùng bình thường và gián đoạn tệp torrent.<br/><br/>Tuy nhiên, không nên cấm IP vì ở một số quốc gia có mạng LAN lớn, các nhà cung cấp dịch vụ mạng sẽ sử dụng địa chỉ IP động được chỉ định cho hơn 100 người dùng cùng lúc và việc cấm IP có thể dẫn đến việc cấm nhầm nhiều người dùng cùng một lúc. <br/><br/> Những ứng dụng torrent khác dựa trên aria2, sẽ tải lên đồng thời trong quá trình tải xuống. Sau khi quá trình tải xuống tệp hoàn tất, bạn sẽ không còn là người lấy phần nữa. Hãy cân nhắc đóng góp dữ liệu tải lên, tham gia vào quá trình góp phần, để mọi người cùng có tốc độ tải xuống nhanh hơn."

install_notice2_=Phần mềm không có máy chủ trung tâm và sẽ không hợp tác với bất kỳ tổ chức thương mại hoặc cơ quan có thẩm quyền nào để quét và tải lên bất kỳ dữ liệu cá nhân và lịch sử truyền tải nào trong thiết bị của bạn, nhưng nếu bạn không sử dụng proxy hoặc VPN được mã hóa, ISP (Nhà cung cấp dịch vụ Internet) Và một số nhà sản xuất bộ định tuyến vẫn có khả năng giám sát và thu thập dữ liệu truyền tải mạng của bạn. Sau khi khởi động phần mềm, thiết bị của bạn sẽ trở thành một điểm nút tham gia trong mạng HASH phân tán, được sử dụng để lưu trữ các liên kết được chia sẻ bởi những người dùng khác trong mạng phân tán siêu dữ liệu torrent, chiếm một lượng rất nhỏ lưu lượng mạng và bộ nhớ, được sử dụng để trợ giúp người dùng khác, quá trình này không ghi lại địa chỉ IP của bạn và sẽ che giấu dữ liệu để đánh lừa những kẻ tấn công nguy hiểm, nếu bạn không đồng ý với điều này, thì việc sử dụng phần mềm của bạn sẽ trở thành gánh nặng cho toàn bộ hệ sinh thái torrent, bạn nên hủy cài đặt phần mềm này, và nếu bạn tiếp tục cài đặt phần mềm thì bạn đã đồng ý với điều khoản này.

install_notice2_=该软件无中心服务器, 不会配合任何商业组织或权力机构扫描及上传你设备中的任何私有数据和传输历史等, 但在你不使用加密代理或者VPN的情况下, ISP(互联网服务供应商)和部分路由器制造商仍然具备监视并搜集你网络请求数据的能力.<br/><br/>启动该软件之后你的设备将会成为分布式HASH表中的一个节点, 用于储存来自分布式网络中其他用户共享的磁力链接对应的Torrent元数据, 这会在消耗非常少量的网络流量和内存, 这用于帮助其他用户, 这个过程不会记录你的IP地址, 并且会伪造虚假数据用于欺骗恶意攻击者, 如果你不同意这一点, 那么你使用该软件将会成为整个生态环境中的一个负担, 你应该取消安装这个软件, 如果你继续安装该软件则表示你同意这个条款.

leeches_description_=「吸血蟲」只下載資料，卻不上傳資料給其他使用者，這種行為會導致其他使用者下載速度變慢，資源也會提早失效。<br/><br/>但不建議封鎖 IP 位址，因為在某些大型區域網路國家，網路服務供應商會將同一個動態 IP 位址分配給超過 100 個使用者，封鎖 IP 位址可能會導致多個使用者同時被封鎖。<br/><br/>基於 aria2 的其他用戶端會在下載過程中上傳資料，下載完成後程式會結束，不會繼續做種，這不屬於吸血蟲行為，但應該降低其上傳優先順序。

content_section_4_=Or, use the browser extension to download files through the web browser.

================
File: lang/website/documentation/how_to_increase_download_speed/en_US.lang
================
content_section_1_="
For the HTTP task, the default parallel setting is smooth, but you can change it to fastest, it could increase your download speed and save your time about 1-30 seconds.
"

content_section_2_="
But changing it to the fastest may cause your IP address to be blocked by the remote server. (low probability)
"

content_section_3_="
For the Torrent task, you can add trackers to increase your download & upload speed.
But the condition is other peers are using the same tracker and downloading or uploading the same file.
"

================
File: lang/website/documentation/how_to_increase_download_speed/id_ID.lang
================
content_section_1_="
Untuk tugas HTTP, pengaturan paralel default adalah halus, tetapi Anda dapat mengubahnya menjadi tercepat, yang dapat meningkatkan kecepatan unduh Anda dan menghemat waktu Anda sekitar 1-30 detik.
"

content_section_2_="
Namun, mengubahnya menjadi tercepat dapat menyebabkan alamat IP Anda diblokir oleh server jarak jauh. (probabilitas rendah)
"

content_section_3_="
Untuk tugas Torrent, Anda dapat menambahkan tracker untuk meningkatkan kecepatan unduh & unggah Anda.
Tetapi syaratnya adalah peer lain menggunakan tracker yang sama dan mengunduh atau mengunggah file yang sama.
"

================
File: lang/website/documentation/how_to_increase_download_speed/ko_KR.lang
================
content_section_1_="
HTTP 작업의 경우 기본 병렬 설정은 매끄러운이지만 가장 빠른으로 변경할 수 있으므로 다운로드 속도를 높이고 시간을 1~30초 정도 절약할 수 있습니다.
"

content_section_2_="
그러나 가장 빠른으로 변경하면 원격 서버에 의해 IP 주소가 차단될 수 있습니다. (낮은 확률)
"

content_section_3_="
토렌트 작업의 경우 트래커를 추가하여 다운로드 및 업로드 속도를 높일 수 있습니다.
그러나 다른 피어가 동일한 트래커를 사용하여 동일한 파일을 다운로드하거나 업로드하는 경우입니다.
"

================
File: lang/website/documentation/how_to_increase_download_speed/ru_RU.lang
================
content_section_1_="
For the HTTP task, the default parallel setting is smooth, but you can change it to fastest, it could increase your download speed and save your time about 1-30 seconds.
"

content_section_2_="
But changing it to the fastest may cause your IP address to be blocked by the remote server. (low probability)
"

content_section_3_="
For the Torrent task, you can add trackers to increase your download & upload speed.
But the condition is other peers are using the same tracker and downloading or uploading the same file.
"

================
File: lang/website/documentation/how_to_increase_download_speed/zh_CN.lang
================
content_section_1_="
对于HTTP任务, 默认的并行设置为平滑的，但你可以将其改为最快的，这可以增加你的下载速度，可以节省大约1-30秒时间。
"

content_section_2_="
但是设置为最快的可能导致你的IP地址被远程服务器封锁。（小几率）
"

content_section_3_="
对于BT任务，你可以添加追踪器来增加你的上传 & 下载速度。
但是条件是有其他用户也在使用这个追踪器并且正在下载或上传相同的文件。
"

================
File: lang/website/documentation/how_to_increase_download_speed/zh_TW.lang

"

content_section_2_="

"

content_section_3_="
對於BT任務，你可以新增追蹤器來新增你的上傳&下載速度。
但是條件是有其他使用者也在使用這個追蹤器並且正在下載或上傳相同的檔案。
"

File Centipede도 Bittorrent 클라이언트입니다. 토렌트 및 자석 링크 다운로드, 시딩, 토렌트 생성, 트래커, 웹 시드,
피어 목록, 속도 제한 및 토렌트/자석 변환과 같은 모든 Bittorrent 클라이언트 기능을 갖추고 있습니다.
"

File: lang/website/features/ftp_file_manager/en_US.lang
================
content_section_1_="
File Centipede is also an FTP file manager, it can download & upload files from an FTP server, including directories or the whole FTP site.
"
content_section_2_="
It's very easy to use, you don't need to input tons of settings, you just need to enter the host address into the address bar.
"

content_section_3_="
To maximize the speed of listing directory files,
File Centipede can cache all directory files you have visited, the next time you list the same directory will be like opening a local directory.
"

================
File: lang/website/features/ftp_file_manager/id_ID.lang
================
content_section_1_="
File Centipede juga merupakan manajer file FTP, dapat mengunduh & mengunggah file dari server FTP, termasuk direktori atau seluruh situs FTP.
"

content_section_2_="
Sangat mudah digunakan, Anda tidak perlu memasukkan banyak pengaturan, Anda hanya perlu memasukkan alamat host ke dalam bilah alamat.
"

content_section_3_="
Untuk memaksimalkan kecepatan daftar file direktori,
File Centipede dapat menyimpan cache semua file direktori yang telah Anda kunjungi, sehingga saat Anda membuka direktori yang sama berikutnya akan terasa seperti membuka direktori lokal.
"

================
File: lang/website/features/ftp_file_manager/ko_KR.lang
================
content_section_1_="
File Centipede는 FTP 파일 관리자이기도 하며 디렉터리 또는 전체 FTP 사이트를 포함하여 FTP 서버에서 파일을 다운로드하고 업로드할 수 있습니다.
"
content_section_2_="
이 기능은 매우 사용하기 쉽고, 많은 설정을 입력할 필요가 없으며, 주소 표시줄에 호스트 주소를 입력하기만 하면 됩니다.
"

content_section_3_="
디렉터리 파일 나열 속도를 최대화하려면 다음과 같이 하십시오.
File Centipede는 방문한 모든 디렉터리 파일을 캐시할 수 있으며, 다음에 나열할 때 동일한 디렉터리가 로컬 디렉터리를 여는 것과 같습니다.
"

================

File: lang/website/features/ftp_file_manager/zh_CN.lang
================
content_section_1_=文件蜈蚣也是一个FTP文件管理器，它可以从FTP服务器中上传 & 下载文件，包括文件夹和整个站点.
content_section_2_=它非常容易使用，你不需要输入一大堆的设置，你只需要输入主机地址到地址栏。
content_section_3_=为了最大化文件列表速度，文件蜈蚣可以缓存所有你访问过的目录文件，下一次你打开相同文件夹时候就像打开本地文件夹一样.

================
File: lang/website/features/ftp_file_manager/zh_TW.lang
================
content_section_1_=檔案蜈蚣也是一個FTP檔案管理器，它可以從FTP伺服器中上傳&下載檔案，包括資料夾和整個網站.
content_section_2_=它非常容易使用，你不需要輸入一大堆的設定，你只需要輸入主機地址到位址列。
content_section_3_=為了最大化檔案清單速度，檔案蜈蚣可以快取所有你存取過的目錄檔案，下一次你開啟相同資料夾時候就像開啟本機資料夾一樣.

File: lang/website/features/remote_download_manager/en_US.lang
================
content_section_1_=File centipede provided a native user interface for remote file downloading.
content_section_2_=It's located on the main menu called <b>remote</b>.
content_section_3_=It's very simple to use. You just need to input the remote host's IP/domain address, then click the host from the menu item you just added.
content_section_4_=If you want your computer to be connectable, your need to open the Setting -> Service, and toggle the <b>Remote access</b> to the <b>enable</b>. and don't forget to set a password.

================
File: lang/website/features/remote_download_manager/id_ID.lang
================
content_section_1_=File Centipede menyediakan antarmuka pengguna asli untuk mengunduh file jarak jauh.
content_section_2_=Ini terletak di menu utama yang disebut <b>jarak jauh</b>.
content_section_3_=Sangat sederhana untuk digunakan. Anda hanya perlu memasukkan alamat IP/domain host jarak jauh, lalu klik host dari item menu yang baru saja Anda tambahkan.
content_section_4_=Jika Anda ingin komputer Anda dapat terhubung, Anda perlu membuka Pengaturan -> Layanan, dan aktifkan <b>Akses jarak jauh</b> ke <b>aktif</b>. Dan jangan lupa untuk mengatur kata sandi.

File: lang/website/features/remote_download_manager/ko_KR.lang
================
content_section_1_=File centipede는 원격 파일 다운로드를 위한 기본 사용자 인터페이스를 제공했습니다.
content_section_2_=그것은 <b>원격</b>이라는 기본 메뉴에 있습니다.
content_section_3_=사용법이 매우 간단합니다. 원격 호스트의 IP/도메인 주소를 입력한 다음 방금 추가한 메뉴 항목에서 호스트를 클릭하면 됩니다.
content_section_4_=컴퓨터를 연결할 수 있도록 하려면 설정 -> 서비스를 열고 <b>원격 접근</b>을 사용 가능으로 전환하고 암호를 설정해야 합니다.

content_section_1_="
File Centipede can download videos from more than 99% of websites.
"

content_section_2_="
It even can analyze video addresses from Javascript, and extract decrypted video-key from Javascript closure.
For some special websites, only File Centipede is able to download its video.
"

content_section_3_="
It provided two easy ways to download videos or audio from the webpage.
"

content_section_4_="
1: Download from the floating bar beside of video.
"

content_section_5_="
2: Download from the popup window.
"

"

content_section_2_="
Ini bahkan dapat menganalisis alamat video dari Javascript, dan mengekstrak kunci video yang terdekripsi dari penutupan Javascript.
Untuk beberapa situs web khusus, hanya File Centipede yang dapat mengunduh videonya.
"

content_section_3_="
Ini menyediakan dua cara mudah untuk mengunduh video atau audio dari halaman web.
"

content_section_4_="
1: Unduh dari bilah mengambang di samping video.
"

content_section_5_="
2: Unduh dari jendela pop-up.
"

File: lang/website/features/video_downloader/ko_KR.lang

content_section_1_="
File Centipede는 99% 이상의 웹 사이트에서 동영상을 다운로드할 수 있습니다.
"

content_section_2_="
또한 Javascript에서 비디오 주소를 분석하고 Javascript 폐쇄에서 해독된 비디오 키를 추출할 수 있습니다.
일부 특수 웹 사이트의 경우 파일 지네만 비디오를 다운로드할 수 있습니다.
"

content_section_3_="
그것은 웹 페이지에서 비디오나 오디오를 다운로드하는 두 가지 쉬운 방법을 제공했습니다.
"

content_section_4_="
1: 동영상 옆에 있는 플로팅 표시줄에서 다운로드합니다.
"

content_section_5_="
2: 팝업 창에서 다운로드합니다.
"

File: lang/website/os/linux_download_manager/en_US.lang
================
content_section_1_="
<p>File Centipede is the best Linux download manager.</p>
<p>It's the only one that supports all mainstream protocols and the video sniffer's Linux download manager.</p>
"

content_section_2_="
It also contains tons of auxiliary tools like file-merge, checksum, base64-encoder, URI-encoder, and magnet-to-torrent......
"

content_section_3_="
You can also use it to manage remote files like WebDAV, FTP, and SSH.
"

content_section_4_="
It's very easy to install, only need one click, and it has no other dynamic libraries requirement, even Glibc.
"

content_section_1_="
<p>File Centipede adalah manajer unduh Linux terbaik.</p>
<p>Ini adalah satu-satunya yang mendukung semua protokol utama dan manajer unduh video sniffer untuk Linux.</p>
"

content_section_2_="
Ini juga berisi banyak alat bantu seperti penggabungan file, checksum, pengkode base64, pengkode URI, dan magnet-ke-torrent......
"

content_section_3_="
Anda juga dapat menggunakannya untuk mengelola file jarak jauh seperti WebDAV, FTP, dan SSH.
"

content_section_4_="
Sangat mudah untuk menginstalnya, hanya perlu satu klik, dan tidak memerlukan pustaka dinamis lainnya, bahkan Glibc.
"

content_section_1_="
<p>File Centipede는 최고의 Linux 다운로드 관리자입니다.</p>
<p>모든 주류 프로토콜과 비디오 탐지기의 리눅스 다운로드 관리자를 지원하는 유일한 것입니다.</p>
"

content_section_2_="
또한 파일 병합, 체크섬, Base64-인코더, Uri-인코더 및 자석을 토렌트와 같은 수많은 보조 도구가 포함되어 있습니다.......
"

content_section_3_="
또한 WebDav, FTP 및 SSH와 같은 원격 파일을 관리하는 데 사용될 수도 있습니다.
"

content_section_4_="
설치가 매우 쉽고 한 번의 클릭만으로 다른 동적 라이브러리 요구 사항이 없으며 Glibc도 없습니다.
"

File: README.ar.md

[إنجليزي](./README.md)\|[الصينية المبسطة](./README.zh-CN.md)\|[الصينية التقليدية](./README.zh-TW.md)\|[الكورية](./README.ko.md)\|[لا](./README.hi.md)\|[عربي](./README.ar.md)\|[فرنسي](./README.fr.md)\|[الروسية](./README.ru.md)\|[اللاتينية](./README.la.md)\|[اليابانية](./README.ja.md)\|[ايطالي](./README.it.md)\|[ألماني](./README.de.md)\|[الأسبانية](./README.es.md)\|[السويدية](./README.sv.md)\|[الفارسية](./README.fa.md)\|[اللغة التركية](./README.tr-TR.md)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/100348948/165334090-0b1a6f28-554e-484b-9946-1ffef010fa78.png)

# 

[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede](https://badges.gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede.svg)](https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)

<a href="http://filecxx.com" target="_blank">
  <img src="./style/images/logo_128.png" width="128" alt="File Centipede Icon" />
</a>

File Centipede هو مدير تحميل/تنزيل ملفات الإنترنت متعدد الإمكانات، وعميل BitTorrent، وعميل WebDAV، وعميل FTP، وعميل SSH.

لقد تم تصميمه ليكون سريعًا وقابلاً للتخصيص وسهل الاستخدام.

وهو يدعم البروتوكولات المتعددة ويحتوي على العديد من الأدوات المساعدة المفيدة مثل طالب HTTP ودمج الملفات وأجهزة التشفير.

من خلال تكامل المتصفح، يمكنك تنزيل الصوت ومقاطع الفيديو من مواقع الويب، وحتى مقاطع الفيديو المشفرة.

(إنه مجاني بدون إعلانات)

موقع إلكتروني:[حطب://فيلسكسكس.كوم](http://filecxx.com)

لوحة القيادة:[هتبص://و.فيلسكسكس.كوم](https://w.filecxx.com)

الرعاة:[حطب://وو.فيلسكسكس.كوم/إنس/سبنسرس.هتمل](http://www.filecxx.com/en_US/sponsors.html)

## سمات

-   بروتوكول HTTP وHTTPS (لن يتم إدراج الميزات الأساسية مثل gzip والقابلة للاستئناف والاتصالات المتعددة.) 1.0
-   بروتوكول نقل الملفات، بروتوكول FTPS 1.0
-   مغناطيس، عنوان التجزئة 1.0
-   بت تورنت 1.0
-   بروتوكول مخصص آخر مثل الرعد، برنامج Flashget، QQDL 1.0
-   العنوان المنسق JSON 1.0
-   مهمة دفق m3u8 1.0
-   فك تشفير مهمة الدفق AES-128 (فك تشفير SAMPLE-AES غير مدعوم حتى الآن) 1.0
-   ملف تعريف ارتباط HTTP، والرأس، ووكيل المستخدم مع تخصيص المستخدم 1.0
-   حد البذر سيل 1.0
-   تحرير تكوين مهمة النقل 1.0 ديناميكيًا
-   مكافحة العلق 1.0
-   تحديث العنوان منتهي الصلاحية 1.0
-   الكتالوجات 1.0
-   الحد من التنزيل وسرعة التحميل 1.0
-   إنشاء عنوان مخصص (ملف، ملف) 1.0
-   إدارة الوكيل 1.0
-   تخصيص الفلتر 1.0
-   إدارة التتبع 1.0
-   تفاصيل المهمة 1.0
-   تصدير سيل من المهمة 1.0
-   متعدد اللغات 1.0
-   قائمة الانتظار أو إعداد التزامن غير المحدود 1.0
-   التكامل مع متصفح كروم 1.0
-   التكامل مع متصفح فايرفوكس 1.0
-   التقاط مقاطع الفيديو والتسجيلات الصوتية من صفحة الويب 1.0
-   ابحث عن جميع المغناطيسات من صفحة الويب 1.0
-   أداة الترجمة 1.0
-   أداة HTTP 1.0
-   أداة تشفير/فك تشفير URI 1.0
-   أداة التشفير وفك التشفير Base64 1.0
-   أداة اختبار Regex 1.0
-   إنشاء تورنت 1.0
-   أداة التورنت إلى المغناطيس 1.0
-   أداة المغناطيس للتورنت 1.0
-   أداة دمج الملفات 1.0
-   الإحصائيات 1.0
-   تنزيل جميع الروابط من صفحة الويب 1.6
-   SSH، بروتوكول SFTP 2.0
-   حليقة، wget، aria2، سطر الأوامر أكسل 2.0
-   بروتوكول WebDAV 2.0
-   تحميل الملف 2.0
-   تحميل الدليل 2.0
-   تحميل الدليل 2.0
-   مدير ملفات WebDAV (برامج) كامل المواصفات 2.0
-   مدير ملفات FTP (ملفات) كامل المواصفات 2.0
-   مدير ملفات SSH(sftp) كامل المواصفات 2.0
-   ذاكرة التخزين المؤقت المستمرة لمتصفح الملفات 2.0
-   قواعد الموقع 2.1
-   أداة المجموع الاختباري 2.3
-   التحميل عن بعد 2.6

## مصدر الرمز

يمكن العثور على كود المصدر الكامل لـ FileU في دليل "source_code".

إنه لأغراض العرض التوضيحي فقط، والمكتبات التابعة المستخدمة في المشروع ليست مفتوحة المصدر.

لقد أثبت أن كتابة واجهات المستخدم بلغة C++ يمكن أن تكون أسهل بكثير من HTML وJavaScript، دون تقليل الأداء.

(كما هو موضح في ملفات .sml في دليل "UI").

## يترجم

إذا أعجبك هذا البرنامج، فيمكنك المساعدة باستخدام أداة الترجمة المتوفرة في البرنامج لترجمته إلى لغات أخرى.

وهذا سيجعل البرنامج في متناول الأشخاص الذين يتحدثون لغات أخرى غير تلك التي تمت كتابتها بها في الأصل. وستكون مساهمتك موضع تقدير كبير.

## ملفات اللغة

-   موقع الويب: "lang/website/\*.lang"
-   البرنامج: "lang/software/\*.lang"
-   ملحق المتصفح: "lang/browser_extension/\*.lang"

# 

[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede](https://badges.gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede.svg)](https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)

<a href="http://filecxx.com" target="_blank">
  <img src="./style/images/logo_128.png" width="128" alt="File Centipede Icon" />
</a>

File Centipede ist ein All-In-One-Internet-Datei-Upload/Download-Manager, BitTorrent-Client, WebDAV-Client, FTP-Client und SSH-Client.

Es ist schnell, anpassbar und benutzerfreundlich konzipiert.

Es unterstützt Multiprotokolle und enthält viele nützliche Hilfstools wie HTTP-Requester, Dateizusammenführung und Encoder.

Mit der Browser-Integration können Sie Audio- und Videodateien von Websites herunterladen, sogar verschlüsselte Videos.

(Es ist kostenlos und ohne Werbung)

Webseite:<http://filecxx.com>

Armaturenbrett:<https://w.filecxx.com>

Sponsoren:<http://www.filecxx.com/en_US/sponsors.html>

## Merkmale

-   HTTP,HTTPS-Protokoll (grundlegende Funktionen wie gzip, fortsetzbar, Mehrfachverbindungen werden nicht aufgeführt.) 1.0
-   FTP, FTPS-Protokoll 1.0
-   Magnet, HASH-Adresse 1.0
-   BitTorrent 1.0
-   Andere benutzerdefinierte Protokolle wie Thunder, Flashget, QQDL 1.0
-   JSON-formatierte Adresse 1.0
-   m3u8 Stream-Aufgabe 1.0
-   Stream-Task-AES-128-Entschlüsselung (SAMPLE-AES-Entschlüsselung wird noch nicht unterstützt) 1.0
-   HTTP-Cookie, Header, Benutzeragent mit Benutzeranpassung 1.0
-   Torrent-Seeding-Limit 1.0
-   Bearbeiten Sie die Übertragungsaufgabenkonfiguration 1.0 dynamisch
-   Anti-Blutegel 1.0
-   Abgelaufene Adresse 1.0 aktualisieren
-   Kataloge 1.0
-   Beschränken Sie die Download- und Upload-Geschwindigkeit auf 1,0
-   Erstellen Sie eine benutzerdefinierte Adresse (filec, fileu) 1.0
-   Proxy-Verwaltung 1.0
-   Filter anpassen 1.0
-   Tracker-Management 1.0
-   Aufgabendetails 1.0
-   Torrent aus Aufgabe 1.0 exportieren
-   Mehrsprachig 1.0
-   Warteschlange oder unbegrenzte Parallelitätseinstellung 1.0
-   Chrome-Browser-Integration 1.0
-   Firefox-Browser-Integration 1.0
-   Erfassen Sie Videos und Audios von der Webseite 1.0
-   Finden Sie alle Magnete ab Webseite 1.0
-   Übersetzungstool 1.0
-   HTTP-Tool 1.0
-   URI-Kodierungs-/Dekodierungstool 1.0
-   Base64-Kodierungs-/Dekodierungstool 1.0
-   Regex-Testtool 1.0
-   Erstellen Sie Torrent 1.0
-   Torrent to Magnet Tool 1.0
-   Magnet zum Torrent-Tool 1.0
-   Dateizusammenführungstool 1.0
-   Statistik 1.0
-   Laden Sie alle Links von Webseite 1.6 herunter
-   SSH, SFTP-Protokoll 2.0
-   Curl, Wget, Aria2, Axel Befehlszeile 2.0
-   WebDAV-Protokoll 2.0
-   Datei 2.0 hochladen
-   Verzeichnis 2.0 hochladen
-   Verzeichnis 2.0 herunterladen
-   Vollständiger WebDAV(s)-Dateimanager 2.0
-   Voll ausgestatteter FTP(s)-Dateimanager 2.0
-   Voll ausgestatteter SSH(SFTP)-Dateimanager 2.0
-   Persistente Caches des Dateibrowsers 2.0
-   Website-Regeln 2.1
-   Prüfsummentool 2.3
-   Remote-Download 2.6

## Quellcode

Der vollständige Quellcode von FileU finden Sie im Verzeichnis „source_code“.

Dies dient nur zu Demonstrationszwecken. Die im Projekt verwendeten abhängigen Bibliotheken sind nicht Open Source.

Es hat sich gezeigt, dass das Schreiben von Benutzeroberflächen in C++ erheblich einfacher sein könnte als in HTML und JavaScript, ohne die Leistung zu beeinträchtigen.

(wie in den .sml-Dateien im Verzeichnis „UI“ zu sehen).

## Übersetzen

Wenn Ihnen diese Software gefällt, können Sie helfen, indem Sie das in der Software enthaltene Übersetzungstool verwenden, um sie in andere Sprachen zu übersetzen.

Dadurch wird die Software für Menschen zugänglicher, die andere Sprachen sprechen als die, in der sie ursprünglich geschrieben wurde. Ihr Beitrag wäre sehr dankbar.

## Sprachdateien

-   Website: „lang/website/\*.lang“
-   Software: „lang/software/\*.lang“
-   Browsererweiterung: „lang/browser_extension/\*.lang“

# 

[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede](https://badges.gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede.svg)](https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)

<a href="http://filecxx.com" target="_blank">
  <img src="./style/images/logo_128.png" width="128" alt="File Centipede Icon" />
</a>

File centipede es un administrador de carga/descarga de archivos de Internet todo en uno, cliente BitTorrent, cliente WebDAV, cliente FTP y cliente SSH.

Está diseñado para ser rápido, personalizable y fácil de usar.

Admite múltiples protocolos y contiene muchas herramientas auxiliares útiles, como el solicitante HTTP, la combinación de archivos y los codificadores.

Con la integración del navegador, puede descargar audio y videos de sitios web, incluso videos encriptados.

(Es gratis sin anuncios)

Sitio web:<http://filecxx.com>

Panel:<https://w.filecxx.com>

Patrocinadores:<http://www.filecxx.com/en_US/sponsors.html>

## características

-   HTTP, protocolo HTTPS (no se enumerarán las características básicas como gzip, reanudable, conexiones múltiples). 1.0
-   FTP, protocolo FTPS 1.0
-   Imán, dirección HASH 1.0
-   BitTorrent 1.0
-   Otro protocolo personalizado como trueno, flashget, qqdl 1.0
-   Dirección con formato JSON 1.0
-   tarea de flujo m3u8 1.0
-   Descifrado AES-128 de la tarea de transmisión (el descifrado SAMPLE-AES aún no es compatible) 1.0
-   Cookie HTTP, encabezado, agente de usuario con usuario personalizado 1.0
-   Límite de siembra de torrent 1.0
-   Editar dinámicamente la configuración de tareas de transferencia 1.0
-   Anti sanguijuelas 1.0
-   Actualizar dirección caducada 1.0
-   Catálogos 1.0
-   Limitar descarga, subir velocidad 1.0
-   Crear dirección personalizada (filec, fileu) 1.0
-   Gestión de proxy 1.0
-   Filtro personalizar 1.0
-   Gestión de rastreadores 1.0
-   Detalles de la tarea 1.0
-   Exportar torrent desde la tarea 1.0
-   Multi idiomas 1.0
-   Cola o configuración de concurrencia ilimitada 1.0
-   Integración del navegador Chrome 1.0
-   Integración del navegador Firefox 1.0
-   Captura videos, audios desde página web 1.0
-   Encuentra todos los imanes de la página web 1.0
-   Traducir herramienta 1.0
-   Herramienta HTTP 1.0
-   Herramienta de codificación/descodificación de URI 1.0
-   Herramienta de codificación/decodificación Base64 1.0
-   Herramienta de prueba Regex 1.0
-   Crear torrente 1.0
-   Torrent a herramienta magnética 1.0
-   Imán a la herramienta torrent 1.0
-   Herramienta de combinación de archivos 1.0
-   Estadísticas 1.0
-   Descargar todos los enlaces de la página web 1.6
-   SSH, protocolo SFTP 2.0
-   curl, wget, aria2, línea de comando axel 2.0
-   Protocolo WebDAV 2.0
-   Subir archivo 2.0
-   Subir directorio 2.0
-   Descargar directorio 2.0
-   Administrador de archivos WebDAV(s) 2.0 con todas las funciones
-   Administrador de archivos FTP(s) 2.0 con todas las funciones
-   Administrador de archivos SSH (sftp) 2.0 con todas las funciones
-   Explorador de archivos cachés persistentes 2.0
-   Reglas del sitio 2.1
-   Herramienta de suma de comprobación 2.3
-   Descarga remota 2.6

## Código fuente

El código fuente completo de FileU se puede encontrar en el directorio "source_code".

Es solo para fines de demostración, las bibliotecas dependientes utilizadas en el proyecto no son de código abierto.

Ha demostrado que escribir interfaces de usuario en C++ podría ser significativamente más fácil que HTML y JavaScript, sin reducir el rendimiento.

(como se ve en los archivos .sml en el directorio "UI").

## Traducir

Si le gusta este software, puede ayudar utilizando la herramienta de traducción provista en el software para traducirlo a otros idiomas.

Esto hará que el software sea más accesible para las personas que hablan idiomas distintos al idioma en el que se escribió originalmente. Su contribución sería muy apreciada.

## Archivos de lenguaje

-   Sitio web: "lang/website/\*.lang"
-   Software: "idioma/software/\*.lang"
-   Extensión del navegador: "lang/browser_extension/\*.lang"

| vietnamita        | [@vongtuha](https://github.com/vuongtuha)                                              |
| turco             | [@geeede](https://github.com/geeede)                                                   |
| indonesio         | [@gigglylo](https://github.com/gigglylo)                                               |

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/100348948/165334090-0b1a6f28-554e-484b-9946-1ffef010fa78.png)
#

[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede](https://badges.gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede.svg)](https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)

<a href="http://filecxx.com" target="_blank">
  <img src="./style/images/logo_128.png" width="128" alt="File Centipede Icon" />
</a>



 این یک برنامه مدیریت دانلود/ آپلود همه کاره است که  کلاینت های BitTorrent و WebDAV و FTP و SSH را در اختیار شما قرار میدهد.
 
 این برنامه به گونه‌ای طراحی شده است که سریع، قابل شخصی سازی و کاربرپسند باشد.


این برنامه نه تنها از پروتکل های مخلتف پشتیبانی میکند بلکه بسیاری ابزار کاربردی دیگر مانند HTTP requester و به هم چسباندن فایل ها و انکودر و دیکودر در اختیار شما قرار میدهد.

با استفاده از افزونه‌ی مرورگر این برنامه می‌توانید فایل صوتی و ویدیویی و حتی ویدیوهای رمز گذاری شده را از پخش آنلاین وبسایت‌ها دانلود کنید.

(این برنامه کاملا رایگان است و هیچ تبلیغی  ندارد)

وب سایت برنامه: [http://filecxx.com](http://filecxx.com)

داشبورد: [https://w.filecxx.com](https://w.filecxx.com)


لیست حامی‌های مالی: [http://www.filecxx.com/en_US/sponsors.html](http://www.filecxx.com/en_US/sponsors.html)

## قابلیت‌ها

* HTTP,HTTPS protocol (basic features like gzip, resumable, multi-connections will not be listed.)	1.0
* FTP, FTPS protocol	1.0
* Magnet, HASH address	1.0
* BitTorrent	1.0
* Other custom protocol like thunder, flashget, qqdl	1.0
* JSON formatted address	1.0
* m3u8 stream task	1.0
* Stream task AES-128 decryption (SAMPLE-AES decryption is not supported yet)	1.0
* HTTP cookie, header, user-agent with user customize	1.0
* Torrent seeding limit	1.0
* Dynamically edit transfer-task config	1.0
* Anti leeches	1.0
* Refresh expired address	1.0
* Catalogs	1.0
* Limit download, upload speed	1.0
* Create custom address (filec, fileu)	1.0
* Proxy management	1.0
* Filter customize	1.0
* Tracker management	1.0
* Task details	1.0
* Export torrent from task	1.0
* Multi languages	1.0
* Queue or Unlimited concurrency setting	1.0
* Chrome Browser integration	1.0
* Firefox Browser integration	1.0
* Capture videos, audios from web page	1.0
* Find all magnets from web page	1.0
* Translate tool	1.0
* HTTP tool	1.0
* URI encode/decode tool	1.0
* Base64 encode/decode tool	1.0
* Regex test tool	1.0
* Create torrent	1.0
* Torrent to magnet tool	1.0
* Magnet to torrent tool	1.0
* File merge tool	1.0
* Statistics	1.0
* Download all links from webpage	1.6
* SSH, SFTP protocol	2.0
* curl, wget, aria2, axel command line	2.0
* WebDAV protocol	2.0
* Upload file	2.0
* Upload directory	2.0
* Download directory	2.0
* Full-featured WebDAV(s) file manager	2.0
* Full-featured FTP(s) file manager	2.0
* Full-featured SSH(sftp) file manager	2.0
* File browser persistent caches	2.0
* Site rules	2.1
* Checksum tool	2.3
* Remote download	2.6


## کد منبع

کد منبع کامل FileU را میتوانید در مسیر "source_code" پیدا کنید.

این برنامه تنها برای نمونه و اهداف آزمایشی طراحی شده است وگرنه کتابخانه‌های مورد استفاده در برنامه منبع باز نیستند.

ثابت شده است که نوشتن رابط های کاربری در ++C می تواند به طور قابل توجهی ساده تر از HTML و جاوا اسکریپت باشد، بدون اینکه کارایی کاهش یابد.

(همانطور که در فایل های .sml در دایرکتوری "UI" مشاهده می شود).


## ترجمه 

اگر این نرم افزار مورد پسند شما واقع شد، می توانید با استفاده از ابزار ترجمه ارائه شده در نرم افزار به ترجمه آن به زبان های دیگر کمک کنید.

این امر باعث می شود که نرم افزار برای افرادی که به زبان هایی غیر از زبانی که در ابتدا به آن نوشته شده صحبت می کنند قابل دسترس تر باشد. کمک شما  مورد قدردانی ما خواهد بود.


## فایل های زبان

* وبسایت:  "lang/website/*.lang"
* نرم افزار: "lang/software/*.lang"
* افزونه‌ی مرورگر: "lang/browser_extension/*.lang"

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/100348948/165334090-0b1a6f28-554e-484b-9946-1ffef010fa78.png)

# 

[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede](https://badges.gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede.svg)](https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)

<a href="http://filecxx.com" target="_blank">
  <img src="./style/images/logo_128.png" width="128" alt="File Centipede Icon" />
</a>

File centipede est un gestionnaire de téléchargement/téléchargement de fichiers Internet tout-en-un, un client BitTorrent, un client WebDAV, un client FTP et un client SSH.

Il est conçu pour être rapide, personnalisable et convivial.

Il prend en charge plusieurs protocoles et contient de nombreux outils auxiliaires utiles tels que le demandeur HTTP, la fusion de fichiers et les encodeurs.

Grâce à l'intégration du navigateur, vous pouvez télécharger des fichiers audio et des vidéos à partir de sites Web, même des vidéos cryptées.

(C'est gratuit, sans publicité)

Site web:<http://filecxx.com>

Tableau de bord:<https://w.filecxx.com>

Commanditaires :<http://www.filecxx.com/en_US/sponsors.html>

## caractéristiques

-   Protocole HTTP, HTTPS (les fonctionnalités de base telles que gzip, reprise, multi-connexions ne seront pas répertoriées.) 1.0
-   FTP, protocole FTPS 1.0
-   Aimant, adresse HASH 1.0
-   BitTorrent 1.0
-   Autre protocole personnalisé comme Thunder, Flashget, QQDL 1.0
-   Adresse au format JSON 1.0
-   tâche de flux m3u8 1.0
-   Tâche de flux Décryptage AES-128 (le décryptage SAMPLE-AES n'est pas encore pris en charge) 1.0
-   Cookie HTTP, en-tête, agent utilisateur avec personnalisation utilisateur 1.0
-   Limite d'ensemencement torrent 1.0
-   Modifier dynamiquement la configuration des tâches de transfert 1.0
-   Anti sangsues 1.0
-   Actualiser l'adresse expirée 1.0
-   Catalogues 1.0
-   Limiter le téléchargement, vitesse de téléchargement 1.0
-   Créer une adresse personnalisée (filec, fileu) 1.0
-   Gestion des proxys 1.0
-   Filtre personnaliser 1.0
-   Gestion des trackers 1.0
-   Détails de la tâche 1.0
-   Exporter le torrent de la tâche 1.0
-   Multi langues 1.0
-   Paramètre de file d'attente ou de concurrence illimitée 1.0
-   Intégration du navigateur Chrome 1.0
-   Intégration du navigateur Firefox 1.0
-   Capturez des vidéos et des audios à partir d'une page Web 1.0
-   Trouvez tous les aimants de la page Web 1.0
-   Outil de traduction 1.0
-   Outil HTTP 1.0
-   Outil d'encodage/décodage d'URI 1.0
-   Outil d'encodage/décodage Base64 1.0
-   Outil de test Regex 1.0
-   Créer un torrent 1.0
-   Outil torrent vers aimant 1.0
-   Outil Aimant vers torrent 1.0
-   Outil de fusion de fichiers 1.0
-   Statistiques 1.0
-   Téléchargez tous les liens de la page Web 1.6
-   SSH, protocole SFTP 2.0
-   curl, wget, aria2, ligne de commande axel 2.0
-   Protocole WebDAV 2.0
-   Télécharger le fichier 2.0
-   Répertoire de téléchargement 2.0
-   Télécharger le répertoire 2.0
-   Gestionnaire de fichiers WebDAV(s) complet 2.0
-   Gestionnaire de fichiers FTP(s) complet 2.0
-   Gestionnaire de fichiers SSH(sftp) complet 2.0
-   Caches persistants du navigateur de fichiers 2.0
-   Règles du site 2.1
-   Outil de somme de contrôle 2.3
-   Téléchargement à distance 2.6

## Code source

Le code source complet de FileU se trouve dans le répertoire "source_code".

C'est uniquement à des fins de démonstration, les bibliothèques dépendantes utilisées dans le projet ne sont pas open source.

Il a été prouvé qu’écrire des interfaces utilisateur en C++ pouvait être beaucoup plus simple qu’en HTML et JavaScript, sans réduire les performances.

(comme on le voit dans les fichiers .sml dans le répertoire "UI").

## Traduire

Si vous aimez ce logiciel, vous pouvez nous aider en utilisant l'outil de traduction fourni dans le logiciel pour le traduire dans d'autres langues.

Cela rendra le logiciel plus accessible aux personnes parlant des langues autres que celle dans laquelle il a été initialement écrit. Votre contribution serait grandement appréciée.

## Fichiers de langue

-   Site Web : "lang/website/\*.lang"
-   Logiciel : "lang/software/\*.lang"
-   Extension du navigateur : "lang/browser_extension/\*.lang"

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/100348948/165334090-0b1a6f28-554e-484b-9946-1ffef010fa78.png)

# 

[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede](https://badges.gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede.svg)](https://gitter.im/filecxx/FileCentipede?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)

<a href="http://filecxx.com" target="_blank">
  <img src="./style/images/logo_128.png" width="128" alt="File Centipede Icon" />
</a>

फ़ाइल सेंटीपीड एक ऑल-इन-वन इंटरनेट फ़ाइल अपलोड/डाउनलोड मैनेजर, बिटटोरेंट क्लाइंट, वेबडीएवी क्लाइंट, एफ़टीपी क्लाइंट और एसएसएच क्लाइंट है।

इसे तेज़, अनुकूलन योग्य और उपयोगकर्ता के अनुकूल बनाया गया है।

यह मल्टी-प्रोटोकॉल का समर्थन करता है और इसमें कई उपयोगी सहायक उपकरण जैसे HTTP अनुरोधकर्ता, फ़ाइल मर्ज और एनकोडर शामिल हैं।

ब्राउज़र एकीकरण के साथ, आप वेबसाइटों से ऑडियो और वीडियो, यहां तक ​​कि एन्क्रिप्टेड वीडियो भी डाउनलोड कर सकते हैं।

(यह बिना किसी विज्ञापन के मुफ़्त है)

वेबसाइट:[एचटीटीपी://फिलेक्ष्ष.कॉम](http://filecxx.com)

डैशबोर्ड:[हत्तपः://व.फिलेक्ष्ष.कॉम](https://w.filecxx.com)

प्रायोजक:[एचटीटीपी://ववव.फिलेक्ष्ष.कॉम/ें\_उस/स्पोंसर्स.हटम्ल](http://www.filecxx.com/en_US/sponsors.html)

## Screenshot

## विशेषताएँ

-   HTTP, HTTPS प्रोटोकॉल (gzip, पुनः प्रारंभ करने योग्य, मल्टी-कनेक्शन जैसी बुनियादी सुविधाएं सूचीबद्ध नहीं की जाएंगी।) 1.0
-   एफ़टीपी, एफटीपीएस प्रोटोकॉल 1.0
-   चुंबक, HASH पता 1.0
-   बिटटोरेंट 1.0
-   अन्य कस्टम प्रोटोकॉल जैसे थंडर, फ्लैशगेट, क्यूक्यूडीएल 1.0
-   JSON स्वरूपित पता 1.0
-   m3u8 स्ट्रीम कार्य 1.0
-   स्ट्रीम कार्य AES-128 डिक्रिप्शन (SAMPLE-AES डिक्रिप्शन अभी तक समर्थित नहीं है) 1.0
-   उपयोगकर्ता अनुकूलित 1.0 के साथ HTTP कुकी, हेडर, उपयोगकर्ता-एजेंट
-   टोरेंट सीडिंग सीमा 1.0
-   स्थानांतरण-कार्य कॉन्फ़िगरेशन 1.0 को गतिशील रूप से संपादित करें
-   जोंक रोधी 1.0
-   समाप्त हो चुके पते 1.0 को ताज़ा करें
-   कैटलॉग 1.0
-   डाउनलोड सीमित करें, अपलोड गति 1.0
-   कस्टम पता बनाएं (फाइलसी, फाइलयू) 1.0
-   प्रॉक्सी प्रबंधन 1.0
-   फ़िल्टर अनुकूलित 1.0
-   ट्रैकर प्रबंधन 1.0
-   कार्य विवरण 1.0
-   कार्य 1.0 से टोरेंट निर्यात करें
-   बहु भाषाएँ 1.0
-   कतार या असीमित समवर्ती सेटिंग 1.0
-   क्रोम ब्राउज़र एकीकरण 1.0
-   फ़ायरफ़ॉक्स ब्राउज़र एकीकरण 1.0
-   वेब पेज 1.0 से वीडियो, ऑडियो कैप्चर करें
-   वेब पेज 1.0 से सभी मैग्नेट खोजें
-   अनुवाद उपकरण 1.0
-   HTTP टूल 1.0
-   यूआरआई एनकोड/डीकोड टूल 1.0
-   बेस64 एनकोड/डीकोड टूल 1.0
-   रेगेक्स परीक्षण उपकरण 1.0
-   टोरेंट 1.0 बनाएं
-   टोरेंट टू मैगनेट टूल 1.0
-   मैग्नेट टू टोरेंट टूल 1.0
-   फ़ाइल मर्ज टूल 1.0
-   सांख्यिकी 1.0
-   वेबपेज 1.6 से सभी लिंक डाउनलोड करें
-   एसएसएच, एसएफटीपी प्रोटोकॉल 2.0
-   कर्ल, wget, aria2, एक्सल कमांड लाइन 2.0
-   वेबडीएवी प्रोटोकॉल 2.0
-   फ़ाइल 2.0 अपलोड करें
-   निर्देशिका 2.0 अपलोड करें
-   निर्देशिका 2.0 डाउनलोड करें
-   Full-featured WebDAV(s) file manager	2.0
-   पूर्ण-विशेषीकृत एफ़टीपी फ़ाइल प्रबंधक 2.0
-   पूर्ण विशेषताओं वाला SSH(sftp) फ़ाइल प्रबंधक 2.0
-   फ़ाइल ब्राउज़र लगातार कैश 2.0
-   साइट नियम 2.1
-   चेकसम टूल 2.3
-   रिमोट डाउनलोड 2.6

## सोर्स कोड

FileU का पूर्ण स्रोत कोड "source_code" निर्देशिका में पाया जा सकता है।

यह केवल प्रदर्शन उद्देश्यों के लिए है, परियोजना में प्रयुक्त आश्रित पुस्तकालय खुला स्रोत नहीं हैं।

इसने साबित कर दिया है कि प्रदर्शन को कम किए बिना, C++ में यूजर इंटरफेस लिखना HTML और जावास्क्रिप्ट की तुलना में काफी आसान हो सकता है।

(जैसा कि "यूआई" निर्देशिका में .sml फ़ाइलों में देखा गया है)।

## अनुवाद

यदि आपको यह सॉफ्टवेयर पसंद है, तो आप इसे अन्य भाषाओं में अनुवाद करने के लिए सॉफ्टवेयर में दिए गए अनुवाद टूल का उपयोग करके मदद कर सकते हैं।

यह सॉफ़्टवेयर को उन लोगों के लिए अधिक सुलभ बना देगा जो मूल रूप से लिखी गई भाषा के अलावा अन्य भाषाएँ बोलते हैं। आपके योगदान की बहुत सराहना की जाएगी।

## भाषा फ़ाइलें

-   वेबसाइट: "lang/वेबसाइट/\*.lang"
-   सॉफ्टवेयर: "लैंग/सॉफ्टवेयर/\*.लैंग"
-   ब्राउज़र एक्सटेंशन: "lang/browser_extension/\*.lang"
